◆ FillScript()

void SmartScript::FillScript ( SmartAIEventList  e,
WorldObject *  obj,
AreaTrigger const *  at 
)
4223{
4224 (void)at; // ensure that the variable is referenced even if extra logs are disabled in order to pass compiler checks
4225
4226 if (e.empty())
4227 {
4228 if (obj)
4229 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for Entry {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", obj->GetEntry());
4230
4231 if (at)
4232 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for AreaTrigger {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", at->entry);
4233 return;
4234 }
4235 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = e.begin(); i != e.end(); ++i)
4236 {
4237#ifndef ACORE_DEBUG
4238 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DEBUG_ONLY)
4239 continue;
4240#endif
4241
4242 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DIFFICULTY_ALL)//if has instance flag add only if in it
4243 {
4244 if (obj && obj->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
4245 {
4246 if ((1 << (obj->GetMap()->GetSpawnMode() + 1)) & (*i).event.event_flags)
4247 {
4248 mEvents.push_back((*i));
4249 }
4250 }
4251 continue;
4252 }
4253 mEvents.push_back((*i));//NOTE: 'world(0)' events still get processed in ANY instance mode
4254 }
4255}

◆ FindCreatureNear()

Creature * SmartScript::FindCreatureNear ( WorldObject *  searchObject,
ObjectGuid::LowType  guid 
) const
inline
167 {
168 auto bounds = searchObject->GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().equal_range(guid);
169 if (bounds.first == bounds.second)
170 return nullptr;
171
172 auto creatureItr = std::find_if(bounds.first, bounds.second, [](Map::CreatureBySpawnIdContainer::value_type const& pair)
173 {
174 return pair.second->IsAlive();
175 });
176
177 return creatureItr != bounds.second ? creatureItr->second : bounds.first->second;
178 }

160 if (bounds.first == bounds.second)
161 return nullptr;
162
163 return bounds.first->second;

◆ FindLinkedEvent()

SmartScriptHolder SmartScript::FindLinkedEvent ( uint32  link)
inlineprivate
298 {
299 if (!mEvents.empty())
300 {
301 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
302 {
303 if (i->event_id == link)
304 {
305 return (*i);
306 }
307 }
308 }
309 SmartScriptHolder s;
310 return s;

◆ GetLastInvoker()

Unit * SmartScript::GetLastInvoker ( Unit *  invoker = nullptr) const

4502 // Xinef: Look for invoker only on map of base object... Prevents multithreaded crashes

4504 return ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*GetBaseObject(), mLastInvoker);

◆ GetScript()

void SmartScript::GetScript ( )
4258{
4259 SmartAIEventList e;
4260 if (me)
4261 {
4262 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)me->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
4263 if (e.empty())
4264 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)me->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
4265 FillScript(e, me, nullptr);
4266 }
4267 else if (go)
4268 {
4269 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)go->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
4270 if (e.empty())
4271 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)go->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
4272 FillScript(e, go, nullptr);
4273 }
4274 else if (trigger)
4275 {
4276 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)trigger->entry, mScriptType);
4277 FillScript(e, nullptr, trigger);
4278 }
4279}

◆ GetTargets()

void SmartScript::GetTargets ( ObjectVector &  targets,
SmartScriptHolder const &  e,
Unit *  invoker = nullptr 
) const
2835{
2836 Unit* scriptTrigger = nullptr;
2837 if (invoker)
2838 scriptTrigger = invoker;
2839 else if (Unit* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
2840 scriptTrigger = tempLastInvoker;
2841
2842 WorldObject* baseObject = GetBaseObject();
2843
2844 switch (e.GetTargetType())
2845 {
2846 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
2847 if (baseObject)
2848 targets.push_back(baseObject);
2849 break;
2850 case SMART_TARGET_VICTIM:
2851 if (me)
2852 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
2853 targets.push_back(victim);
2854 break;
2855 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_SECOND_AGGRO:
2856 if (me)
2857 {
2858 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2859 {
2860 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2861 targets.push_back(u);
2862 }
2863 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2864 targets.push_back(u);
2865 }
2866 break;
2867 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_LAST_AGGRO:
2868 if (me)
2869 {
2870 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2871 {
2872 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2873 targets.push_back(u);
2874 }
2875 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2876 targets.push_back(u);
2877 }
2878 break;
2879 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM:
2880 if (me)
2881 {
2882 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2883 {
2884 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2885 targets.push_back(u);
2886 }
2887 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2888 targets.push_back(u);
2889 }
2890 break;
2891 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM_NOT_TOP:
2892 if (me)
2893 {
2894 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2895 {
2896 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2897 targets.push_back(u);
2898 }
2899 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2900 targets.push_back(u);
2901 }
2902 break;
2903 case SMART_TARGET_FARTHEST:
2904 if (me)
2905 {
2906 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinDistance, 0, FarthestTargetSelector(me, e.target.farthest.maxDist, e.target.farthest.playerOnly, e.target.farthest.isInLos)))
2907 targets.push_back(u);
2908 }
2909 break;
2910 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
2911 if (scriptTrigger)
2912 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
2913 break;
2914 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER_VEHICLE:
2915 if (scriptTrigger && scriptTrigger->GetVehicle() && scriptTrigger->GetVehicle()->GetBase())
2916 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger->GetVehicle()->GetBase());
2917 break;
2918 case SMART_TARGET_INVOKER_PARTY:
2919 if (scriptTrigger)
2920 {
2921 if (Player* player = scriptTrigger->ToPlayer())
2922 {
2923 if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
2924 {
2925 for (GroupReference* groupRef = group->GetFirstMember(); groupRef != nullptr; groupRef = groupRef->next())
2926 if (Player* member = groupRef->GetSource())
2927 if (member->IsInMap(player))
2928 targets.push_back(member);
2929 }
2930 // We still add the player to the list if there is no group. If we do
2931 // this even if there is a group (thus the else-check), it will add the
2932 // same player to the list twice. We don't want that to happen.
2933 else
2934 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
2935 }
2936 }
2937 break;
2938 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
2939 {
2940 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
2941 if (!ref)
2942 ref = scriptTrigger;
2943
2944 if (!ref)
2945 {
2946 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker",
2947 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
2948 break;
2949 }
2950
2951 ObjectVector units;
2952 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitRange.maxDist));
2953
2954 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
2955 {
2956 if (!IsCreature(unit))
2957 continue;
2958
2959 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
2960 continue;
2961
2962 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
2963 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitRange.livingState)
2964 {
2965 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
2966 continue;
2967 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
2968 continue;
2969 }
2970
2971 if (((e.target.unitRange.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitRange.creature) || !e.target.unitRange.creature) && ref->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.unitRange.minDist, (float)e.target.unitRange.maxDist))
2972 targets.push_back(unit);
2973 }
2974
2975 break;
2976 }
2977 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
2978 {
2979 ObjectVector units;
2980 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitDistance.dist));
2981
2982 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
2983 {
2984 if (!IsCreature(unit))
2985 continue;
2986
2987 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
2988 continue;
2989
2990 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
2991 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitDistance.livingState)
2992 {
2993 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
2994 continue;
2995 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
2996 continue;
2997 }
2998
2999 if ((e.target.unitDistance.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitDistance.creature) || !e.target.unitDistance.creature)
3000 targets.push_back(unit);
3001 }
3002
3003 break;
3004 }
3005 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE:
3006 {
3007 ObjectVector units;
3008 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goDistance.dist));
3009
3010 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3011 {
3012 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3013 continue;
3014
3015 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3016 continue;
3017
3018 if ((e.target.goDistance.entry && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goDistance.entry) || !e.target.goDistance.entry)
3019 targets.push_back(unit);
3020 }
3021
3022 break;
3023 }
3024 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE:
3025 {
3026
3027 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3028 if (!ref)
3029 ref = scriptTrigger;
3030
3031 if (!ref)
3032 {
3033 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE: Entry: {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3034 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3035 break;
3036 }
3037
3038 ObjectVector units;
3039 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goRange.maxDist));
3040
3041 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3042 {
3043 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3044 continue;
3045
3046 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3047 continue;
3048
3049 if (((e.target.goRange.entry && IsGameObject(unit) && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goRange.entry) || !e.target.goRange.entry) && ref->IsInRange((unit), (float)e.target.goRange.minDist, (float)e.target.goRange.maxDist))
3050 targets.push_back(unit);
3051 }
3052
3053 break;
3054 }
3055 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
3056 {
3057 if (!scriptTrigger && !baseObject)
3058 {
3059 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3060 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3061 break;
3062 }
3063
3064 Creature* target = FindCreatureNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.unitGUID.dbGuid);
3065 if (target && (!e.target.unitGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.unitGUID.entry))
3066 targets.push_back(target);
3067 break;
3068 }
3069 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID:
3070 {
3071 if (!scriptTrigger && !GetBaseObject())
3072 {
3073 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3074 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3075 break;
3076 }
3077
3078 GameObject* target = FindGameObjectNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.goGUID.dbGuid);
3079 if (target && (!e.target.goGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.goGUID.entry))
3080 targets.push_back(target);
3081 break;
3082 }
3083 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3084 {
3085 ObjectVector units;
3086 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerRange.maxDist));
3087
3088 if (!units.empty() && baseObject)
3089 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3090 if (IsPlayer(unit) && baseObject->IsInRange(unit, float(e.target.playerRange.minDist), float(e.target.playerRange.maxDist)))
3091 targets.push_back(unit);
3092 break;
3093 }
3094 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3095 {
3096 ObjectVector units;
3097 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3098
3099 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3100 if (IsPlayer(unit))
3101 targets.push_back(unit);
3102 break;
3103 }
3104 case SMART_TARGET_STORED:
3105 {
3106 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3107 if (!ref)
3108 ref = scriptTrigger;
3109
3110 if (!ref)
3111 {
3112 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_STORED: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3113 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3114 break;
3115 }
3116
3117 if (ObjectVector const* stored = GetStoredTargetVector(e.target.stored.id, *ref))
3118 targets.assign(stored->begin(), stored->end());
3119 break;
3120 }
3121 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3122 {
3123 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3124
3125 if (!ref)
3126 ref = scriptTrigger;
3127
3128 if (!ref)
3129 {
3130 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3131 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3132 break;
3133 }
3134
3135 Creature* target = GetClosestCreatureWithEntry(ref, e.target.unitClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.unitClosest.dist ? e.target.unitClosest.dist : 100), !e.target.unitClosest.dead);
3136 if (target)
3137 targets.push_back(target);
3138 break;
3139 }
3140 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT:
3141 {
3142 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3143
3144 if (!ref)
3145 ref = scriptTrigger;
3146
3147 if (!ref)
3148 {
3149 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3150 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3151 break;
3152 }
3153
3154 GameObject* target = GetClosestGameObjectWithEntry(ref, e.target.goClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.goClosest.dist ? e.target.goClosest.dist : 100), e.target.goClosest.onlySpawned);
3155 if (target)
3156 targets.push_back(target);
3157 break;
3158 }
3159 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3160 {
3161 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3162
3163 if (!ref)
3164 ref = scriptTrigger;
3165
3166 if (!ref)
3167 {
3168 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3169 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3170 break;
3171 }
3172
3173 if (Player* target = ref->SelectNearestPlayer((float)e.target.playerDistance.dist))
3174 targets.push_back(target);
3175 break;
3176 }
3177 case SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER:
3178 /*
3179 * Owners/Summoners should be WorldObjects. This allows to have other objects
3180 * such as gameobjects to execute SmartScripts using this type of target.
3181 * Otherwise, only Units like creatures can summon other creatures.
3182 */
3183 {
3184 if (me)
3185 {
3186 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*me, me->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3187 {
3188 targets.push_back(owner);
3189 }
3190 else if (me->IsSummon() && me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit())
3191 {
3192 targets.push_back(me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit());
3193 }
3194 }
3195 else if (go)
3196 {
3197 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*go, go->GetOwnerGUID()))
3198 {
3199 targets.push_back(owner);
3200 }
3201 }
3202
3203 // xinef: Get owner of owner
3204 if (e.target.owner.useCharmerOrOwner && !targets.empty())
3205 {
3206 if (Unit* owner = targets.front()->ToUnit())
3207 {
3208 targets.clear();
3209
3210 if (Unit* base = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*owner, owner->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3211 {
3212 targets.push_back(base);
3213 }
3214 }
3215 }
3216 break;
3217 }
3218 case SMART_TARGET_THREAT_LIST:
3219 {
3220 if (me)
3221 {
3222 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
3223 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
3224 if (Unit* temp = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
3225 // Xinef: added distance check
3226 if (e.target.threatList.maxDist == 0 || me->IsWithinCombatRange(temp, (float)e.target.threatList.maxDist))
3227 targets.push_back(temp);
3228 }
3229 break;
3230 }
3231 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY:
3232 {
3233 if (me)
3234 if (Unit* target = me->SelectNearestTarget(e.target.closestAttackable.maxDist, e.target.closestAttackable.playerOnly))
3235 targets.push_back(target);
3236
3237 break;
3238 }
3239 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY:
3240 {
3241 if (me)
3242 if (Unit* target = DoFindClosestFriendlyInRange(e.target.closestFriendly.maxDist, e.target.closestFriendly.playerOnly))
3243 targets.push_back(target);
3244
3245 break;
3246 }
3247 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_WITH_AURA:
3248 {
3249 ObjectVector units;
3250 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3251
3252 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3253 if (IsPlayer(unit) && unit->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !unit->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3254 if (GetBaseObject()->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMin, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMax))
3255 if (bool(e.target.playerWithAura.negation) != unit->ToPlayer()->HasAura(e.target.playerWithAura.spellId))
3256 targets.push_back(unit);
3257
3258 if (e.target.o > 0)
3259 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.o);
3260
3261 break;
3262 }
3263 case SMART_TARGET_ROLE_SELECTION:
3264 {
3265 ObjectVector units;
3266 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3267 // 1 = Tanks, 2 = Healer, 4 = Damage
3268 uint32 roleMask = e.target.roleSelection.roleMask;
3269 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3270 if (Player* targetPlayer = unit->ToPlayer())
3271 if (targetPlayer->IsAlive() && !targetPlayer->IsGameMaster())
3272 {
3273 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_TANKS)
3274 {
3275 if (targetPlayer->HasTankSpec())
3276 {
3277 targets.push_back(unit);
3278 continue;
3279 }
3280 }
3281 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_HEALERS)
3282 {
3283 if (targetPlayer->HasHealSpec())
3284 {
3285 targets.push_back(unit);
3286 continue;
3287 }
3288 }
3289 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_DAMAGERS)
3290 {
3291 if (targetPlayer->HasCasterSpec() || targetPlayer->HasMeleeSpec())
3292 {
3293 targets.push_back(unit);
3294 continue;
3295 }
3296 }
3297 }
3298
3299 if (e.target.roleSelection.resize > 0)
3300 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.roleSelection.resize);
3301
3302 break;
3303 }
3304 case SMART_TARGET_VEHICLE_PASSENGER:
3305 {
3306 if (me && me->IsVehicle())
3307 {
3308 if (Unit* target = me->GetVehicleKit()->GetPassenger(e.target.vehicle.seatMask))
3309 {
3310 targets.push_back(target);
3311 }
3312 }
3313 break;
3314 }
3315 case SMART_TARGET_LOOT_RECIPIENTS:
3316 {
3317 if (me)
3318 {
3319 if (Group* lootGroup = me->GetLootRecipientGroup())
3320 {
3321 for (GroupReference* it = lootGroup->GetFirstMember(); it != nullptr; it = it->next())
3322 {
3323 if (Player* recipient = it->GetSource())
3324 {
3325 targets.push_back(recipient);
3326 }
3327 }
3328 }
3329 else
3330 {
3331 if (Player* recipient = me->GetLootRecipient())
3332 {
3333 targets.push_back(recipient);
3334 }
3335 }
3336 }
3337 break;
3338 }
3339 case SMART_TARGET_SUMMONED_CREATURES:
3340 {
3341 if (me)
3342 {
3343 for (ObjectGuid const& guid : _summonList)
3344 {
3345 if (!e.target.summonedCreatures.entry || guid.GetEntry() == e.target.summonedCreatures.entry)
3346 {
3347 if (Creature* creature = me->GetMap()->GetCreature(guid))
3348 {
3349 targets.push_back(creature);
3350 }
3351 }
3352 }
3353 }
3354 break;
3355 }
3356 case SMART_TARGET_NONE:
3357 case SMART_TARGET_POSITION:
3358 default:
3359 break;
3360 }
3361}
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32

◆ InitTimer()

void SmartScript::InitTimer ( SmartScriptHolder &  e)
static
4021{
4022 switch (e.GetEventType())
4023 {
4024 //set only events which have initial timers
4025 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4026 // If onlyFireOnRepeat is true set to 2 before entering combat. Will be set back to 1 after entering combat to ignore initial firing.
4027 if (e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat == 1)
4028 e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat = 2;
4029 // make it predictable
4030 RecalcTimer(e, 500, 500);
4031 break;
4032 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4033 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4034 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer);
4035 break;
4036 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4037 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4038 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4039 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.min, e.event.minMaxRepeat.max);
4040 break;
4041 case SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS:
4042 case SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS:
4043 // Xinef: cooldown should be processed AFTER action is done, not before...
4044 //RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
4045 //break;
4046 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4047 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4048 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4049 break;
4050 default:
4051 e.active = true;
4052 break;
4053 }
4054}

◆ InstallTemplate()

void SmartScript::InstallTemplate ( SmartScriptHolder const &  e)
2724{
2725 if (!GetBaseObject())
2726 return;
2727 if (mTemplate != SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC)
2728 {
2729 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::InstallTemplate: Entry {} SourceType {} AI Template can not be set more then once, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType());
2730 return;
2731 }
2732 mTemplate = (SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id;
2733 switch ((SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id)
2734 {
2735 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CASTER:
2736 {
2737 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2738 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 300, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2739 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4 > 10 ? e.action.installTtemplate.param4 - 10 : 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2740 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5 - 15 > 100 ? 100 : e.action.installTtemplate.param5 + 15, 100, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2741 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2742 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2743 break;
2744 }
2745 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_TURRET:
2746 {
2747 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2748 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2749 break;
2750 }
2751 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_NPC_PART:
2752 {
2753 if (!me)
2754 return;
2755 //store cage as id1
2756 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
2757
2758 //reset(close) cage on hostage(me) respawn
2759 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 5, 0, 0, 0);
2760
2761 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2762 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2763
2764 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2765 //phase 1: give quest credit on movepoint reached
2766 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2767 //phase 1: despawn after time on movepoint reached
2768 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2769
2770 if (sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(me->GetEntry(), (uint8)e.action.installTtemplate.param5))
2771 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_TALK, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2772 break;
2773 }
2774 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_GO_PART:
2775 {
2776 if (!go)
2777 return;
2778 //store hostage as id1
2779 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
2780 //store invoker as id2
2781 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2782 //signal hostage
2783 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2784 //when hostage raeched end point, give credit to invoker
2785 if (e.action.installTtemplate.param2)
2786 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2787 else
2788 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2789 break;
2790 }
2791 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC:
2792 default:
2793 return;
2794 }
2795}
uint8

◆ IsInPhase()

bool SmartScript::IsInPhase ( uint32  p) const
private
4573{
4574 if (mEventPhase == 0)
4575 {
4576 return false;
4577 }
4578
4579 return ((1 << (mEventPhase - 1)) & p) != 0;
4580}

◆ IsSmart()

bool SmartScript::IsSmart ( Creature *  c = nullptr)
inline
87 {
88 bool smart = true;
89 if (c && c->GetAIName() != "SmartAI")
90 smart = false;
91
92 if (!me || me->GetAIName() != "SmartAI")
93 smart = false;
94
95 if (!smart)
96 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target Creature(entry: {}) is not using SmartAI, action skipped to prevent crash.", c ? c->GetEntry() : (me ? me->GetEntry() : 0));
97
98 return smart;
99 }

◆ OnInitialize()

void SmartScript::OnInitialize ( WorldObject *  obj,
AreaTrigger const *  at = nullptr 
)
4282{
4283 if (obj)//handle object based scripts
4284 {
4285 switch (obj->GetTypeId())
4286 {
4287 case TYPEID_UNIT:
4288 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE;
4289 me = obj->ToCreature();
4290 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is Creature {}", me->GetEntry());
4291 break;
4292 case TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT:
4293 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT;
4294 go = obj->ToGameObject();
4295 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is GameObject {}", go->GetEntry());
4296 break;
4297 default:
4298 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: Unhandled TypeID !WARNING!");
4299 return;
4300 }
4301 }
4302 else if (at)
4303 {
4304 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER;
4305 trigger = at;
4306 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is AreaTrigger {}", trigger->entry);
4307 }
4308 else
4309 {
4310 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: !WARNING! Initialized objects are nullptr.");
4311 return;
4312 }
4313
4314 GetScript();//load copy of script
4315
4316 uint32 maxDisableDist = 0;
4317 uint32 minEnableDist = 0;
4318 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
4319 {
4320 InitTimer((*i));//calculate timers for first time use
4321 if (i->GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_RANGE && i->GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT)
4322 {
4323 if (i->action.combatMove.move == 1 && i->event.rangeRepeat.minRange > minEnableDist)
4324 minEnableDist = i->event.rangeRepeat.minRange;
4325 else if (i->action.combatMove.move == 0 && (i->event.rangeRepeat.maxRange < maxDisableDist || maxDisableDist == 0))
4326 maxDisableDist = i->event.rangeRepeat.maxRange;
4327 }
4328
4329 // Xinef: if smartcast combat move flag is present
4330 if (i->GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_CAST && (i->action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE))
4331 {
4332 if (SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(i->action.cast.spell))
4333 {
4334 float maxRange = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4335 float minRange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4336
4337 if (maxRange > 0 && minRange <= maxRange)
4338 {
4339 smartCasterMaxDist = minRange + ((maxRange - minRange) * 0.65f);
4340 smartCasterPowerType = (Powers)spellInfo->PowerType;
4341 }
4342 }
4343 }
4344 }
4345 if (maxDisableDist > 0 && minEnableDist >= maxDisableDist)
4346 mMaxCombatDist = uint32(maxDisableDist + ((minEnableDist - maxDisableDist) / 2));
4347
4348 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_AI_INIT);
4349 InstallEvents();
4350 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED);
4351}

◆ OnReset()

void SmartScript::OnReset ( )
72{
73 // xinef: check if we allow phase reset
74 if (AllowPhaseReset())
75 SetPhase(0);
76
77 ResetBaseObject();
78 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
79 {
80 if (!((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DONT_RESET))
81 {
82 InitTimer((*i));
83 (*i).runOnce = false;
84 }
85 }
86 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_RESET);
87 mLastInvoker.Clear();
88 mCounterList.clear();
89
90 // Xinef: Fix Combat Movement
91 RestoreMaxCombatDist();
92 RestoreCasterMaxDist();
93}

◆ OnUpdate()

void SmartScript::OnUpdate ( const uint32  diff)
4161{
4162 if ((mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE || mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT) && !GetBaseObject())
4163 return;
4164
4165 InstallEvents();//before UpdateTimers
4166
4167 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
4168 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
4169
4170 if (!mStoredEvents.empty())
4171 {
4172 SmartAIEventStoredList::iterator i, icurr;
4173 for (i = mStoredEvents.begin(); i != mStoredEvents.end();)
4174 {
4175 icurr = i++;
4176 UpdateTimer(*icurr, diff);
4177 }
4178 }
4179
4180 bool needCleanup = true;
4181 if (!mTimedActionList.empty())
4182 {
4183 isProcessingTimedActionList = true;
4184 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4185 {
4186 if ((*i).enableTimed)
4187 {
4188 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
4189 needCleanup = false;
4190 }
4191 }
4192
4193 isProcessingTimedActionList = false;
4194 }
4195 if (needCleanup)
4196 mTimedActionList.clear();
4197
4198 if (!mRemIDs.empty())
4199 {
4200 for (std::list<uint32>::const_iterator i = mRemIDs.begin(); i != mRemIDs.end(); ++i)
4201 RemoveStoredEvent(*i);
4202
4203 // xinef: clear list after cleaning...
4204 mRemIDs.clear();
4205 }
4206 if (mUseTextTimer && me)
4207 {
4208 if (mTextTimer < diff)
4209 {
4210 uint32 textID = mLastTextID;
4211 mLastTextID = 0;
4212 uint32 entry = mTalkerEntry;
4213 mTalkerEntry = 0;
4214 mTextTimer = 0;
4215 mUseTextTimer = false;
4216 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER, nullptr, textID, entry);
4217 }
4218 else mTextTimer -= diff;
4219 }
4220}
SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER
@ SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER
Definition: SmartScriptMgr.h:170

◆ ProcessAction()

void SmartScript::ProcessAction ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
115{
116 //calc random
117 if (e.GetEventType() != SMART_EVENT_LINK && e.event.event_chance < 100 && e.event.event_chance)
118 {
119 uint32 rnd = urand(1, 100);
120 if (e.event.event_chance <= rnd)
121 return;
122 }
123 e.runOnce = true;//used for repeat check
124
125 if (unit)
126 mLastInvoker = unit->GetGUID();
127
128 if (Unit* tempInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
129 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Invoker: {} ({})", tempInvoker->GetName(), tempInvoker->GetGUID().ToString());
130
131 bool isControlled = e.action.moveToPos.controlled > 0;
132
133 ObjectVector targets;
134 GetTargets(targets, e, unit);
135
136 switch (e.GetActionType())
137 {
138 case SMART_ACTION_TALK:
139 {
140 Creature* talker = e.target.type == 0 ? me : nullptr;
141 Unit* talkTarget = nullptr;
142
143 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
144 {
145 if (IsCreature((target)) && !target->ToCreature()->IsPet()) // Prevented sending text to pets.
146 {
147 if (e.action.talk.useTalkTarget)
148 {
149 talker = me;
150 talkTarget = target->ToCreature();
151 }
152 else
153 talker = target->ToCreature();
154 break;
155 }
156 else if (IsPlayer((target)))
157 {
158 talker = me; // xinef: added
159 talkTarget = target->ToPlayer();
160 break;
161 }
162 }
163
164 if (!talkTarget)
165 talkTarget = GetLastInvoker();
166
167 if (!talker)
168 break;
169
170 if (!sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(talker->GetEntry(), uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID)))
171 {
172 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: EntryOrGuid {} SourceType {} EventType {} TargetType {} using non-existent Text id {} for talker {}, ignored.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetTargetType(), e.action.talk.textGroupID, talker->GetEntry());
173 break;
174 }
175
176 mTalkerEntry = talker->GetEntry();
177 mLastTextID = e.action.talk.textGroupID;
178 mTextTimer = e.action.talk.duration;
179 mUseTextTimer = true;
180 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(talker, uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID), talkTarget);
181 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: talker: {} ({}), textId: {}", talker->GetName(), talker->GetGUID().ToString(), mLastTextID);
182 break;
183 }
184 case SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK:
185 {
186 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
187 {
188 if (IsCreature(target))
189 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(target->ToCreature(), uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(GetLastInvoker()) ? GetLastInvoker() : 0);
190 else if (IsPlayer(target) && me)
191 {
192 Unit* templastInvoker = GetLastInvoker();
193 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(me, uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(templastInvoker) ? templastInvoker : 0, CHAT_MSG_ADDON, LANG_ADDON, TEXT_RANGE_NORMAL, 0, TEAM_NEUTRAL, false, target->ToPlayer());
194 }
195
196 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK: talker: {} ({}), textGroupId: {}",
197 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID));
198 }
199 break;
200 }
201 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE:
202 {
203 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
204 {
205 if (IsUnit(target))
206 {
207 target->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(e.action.emote.emote);
208 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE: target: {} ({}), emote: {}",
209 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.emote.emote);
210 }
211 }
212 break;
213 }
214 case SMART_ACTION_SOUND:
215 {
216 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
217 {
218 if (IsUnit(target))
219 {
220 if (e.action.sound.distance == 1)
221 target->PlayDistanceSound(e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
222 else
223 target->PlayDirectSound(e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
224 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SOUND: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}",
225 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf);
226 }
227 }
228 break;
229 }
230 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND:
231 {
232 uint32 sounds[4];
233 sounds[0] = e.action.randomSound.sound1;
234 sounds[1] = e.action.randomSound.sound2;
235 sounds[2] = e.action.randomSound.sound3;
236 sounds[3] = e.action.randomSound.sound4;
237 uint32 temp[4];
238 uint32 count = 0;
239 for (unsigned int sound : sounds)
240 {
241 if (sound)
242 {
243 temp[count] = sound;
244 ++count;
245 }
246 }
247
248 if (count == 0)
249 {
250 break;
251 }
252
253 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
254 {
255 if (IsUnit(target))
256 {
257 uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
258 target->PlayDirectSound(sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
259 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}",
260 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf);
261 }
262 }
263
264 break;
265 }
266 case SMART_ACTION_MUSIC:
267 {
268 ObjectVector targets;
269
270 if (e.action.music.type > 0)
271 {
272 if (me && me->FindMap())
273 {
274 Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
275
276 if (!players.IsEmpty())
277 {
278 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
279 if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
280 {
281 if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
282 {
283 if (e.action.music.type > 1)
284 {
285 if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
286 targets.push_back(player);
287 }
288 else
289 targets.push_back(player);
290 }
291 }
292 }
293 }
294 }
295 else
296 GetTargets(targets, e);
297
298 if (!targets.empty())
299 {
300 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
301 {
302 if (IsUnit(target))
303 {
304 target->SendPlayMusic(e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf > 0);
305 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MUSIC: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlySelf: {}, type: {}",
306 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf, e.action.music.type);
307 }
308 }
309 }
310 break;
311 }
312 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC:
313 {
314 ObjectVector targets;
315
316 if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 0)
317 {
318 if (me && me->FindMap())
319 {
320 Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
321
322 if (!players.IsEmpty())
323 {
324 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
325 if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
326 {
327 if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
328 {
329 if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 1)
330 {
331 if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
332 targets.push_back(player);
333 }
334 else
335 targets.push_back(player);
336 }
337 }
338 }
339 }
340 }
341 else
342 GetTargets(targets, e);
343
344 if (targets.empty())
345 break;
346
347 uint32 sounds[4];
348 sounds[0] = e.action.randomMusic.sound1;
349 sounds[1] = e.action.randomMusic.sound2;
350 sounds[2] = e.action.randomMusic.sound3;
351 sounds[3] = e.action.randomMusic.sound4;
352 uint32 temp[4];
353 uint32 count = 0;
354 for (unsigned int sound : sounds)
355 {
356 if (sound)
357 {
358 temp[count] = sound;
359 ++count;
360 }
361 }
362
363 if (count == 0)
364 {
365 break;
366 }
367
368 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
369 {
370 if (IsUnit(target))
371 {
372 uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
373 target->SendPlayMusic(sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf > 0);
374 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}, type: {}",
375 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf, e.action.randomMusic.type);
376 }
377 }
378
379 break;
380 }
381 case SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION:
382 {
383 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
384 {
385 if (IsCreature(target))
386 {
387 if (e.action.faction.factionID)
388 {
389 target->ToCreature()->SetFaction(e.action.faction.factionID);
390 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set faction to {}",
391 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.faction.factionID);
392 }
393 else
394 {
395 if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(target->ToCreature()->GetEntry()))
396 {
397 if (target->ToCreature()->GetFaction() != ci->faction)
398 {
399 target->ToCreature()->SetFaction(ci->faction);
400 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set faction to {}",
401 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), ci->faction);
402 }
403 }
404 }
405 }
406 }
407 break;
408 }
409 case SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
410 {
411 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
412 {
413 if (!IsCreature(target))
414 continue;
415
416 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
417 {
418 //set model based on entry from creature_template
419 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature)
420 {
421 if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
422 {
423 uint32 displayId = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
424 target->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(displayId);
425 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set displayid to {}",
426 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), displayId);
427 }
428 }
429 //if no param1, then use value from param2 (modelId)
430 else
431 {
432 target->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
433 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set displayid to {}",
434 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.morphOrMount.model);
435 }
436 }
437 else
438 {
439 target->ToCreature()->DeMorph();
440 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} demorphs.",
441 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
442 }
443 }
444 break;
445 }
446 case SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST:
447 {
448 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
449 {
450 if (IsPlayer(target))
451 {
452 target->ToPlayer()->FailQuest(e.action.quest.quest);
453 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST: Player guidLow {} fails quest {}",
454 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
455 }
456 }
457 break;
458 }
459 case SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST:
460 {
461 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
462 {
463 if (Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
464 {
465 if (Quest const* q = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(e.action.questOffer.questID))
466 {
467 if (me && e.action.questOffer.directAdd == 0)
468 {
469 if (player->CanTakeQuest(q, true))
470 {
471 if (WorldSession* session = player->GetSession())
472 {
473 PlayerMenu menu(session);
474 menu.SendQuestGiverQuestDetails(q, me->GetGUID(), true);
475 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player guidLow {} - offering quest {}",
476 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
477 }
478 }
479 }
480 else
481 {
482 player->AddQuestAndCheckCompletion(q, nullptr);
483 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player guidLow {} - quest {} added",
484 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
485 }
486 }
487 }
488 }
489 break;
490 }
491 case SMART_ACTION_SET_REACT_STATE:
492 {
493 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
494 {
495 if (!IsCreature(target))
496 continue;
497
498 target->ToCreature()->SetReactState(ReactStates(e.action.react.state));
499 }
500 break;
501 }
502 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE:
503 {
504 std::vector<uint32> emotes;
505 std::copy_if(e.action.randomEmote.emotes.begin(), e.action.randomEmote.emotes.end(),
506 std::back_inserter(emotes), [](uint32 emote) { return emote != 0; });
507
508 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
509 {
510 if (IsUnit(target))
511 {
512 uint32 emote = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(emotes);
513 target->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(emote);
514 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE: Creature guidLow {} handle random emote {}",
515 target->GetGUID().ToString(), emote);
516 }
517 }
518 break;
519 }
520 case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT:
521 {
522 if (!me)
523 break;
524
525 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
526 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
527 {
528 if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
529 {
530 me->GetThreatMgr().ModifyThreatByPercent(target, e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
531 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT: Creature {} modify threat for unit {}, value {}",
532 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
533 }
534 }
535 break;
536 }
537 case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT:
538 {
539 if (!me)
540 break;
541
542 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
543 {
544 if (IsUnit(target))
545 {
546 me->GetThreatMgr().ModifyThreatByPercent(target->ToUnit(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
547 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT: Creature guidLow {} modify threat for unit {}, value %i",
548 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
549 }
550 }
551 break;
552 }
553 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS:
554 {
555 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
556 {
557 // Special handling for vehicles
558 if (IsUnit(target))
559 if (Vehicle* vehicle = target->ToUnit()->GetVehicleKit())
560 for (auto & Seat : vehicle->Seats)
561 if (Player* player = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*target, Seat.second.Passenger.Guid))
562 player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest);
563
564 if (IsPlayer(target))
565 {
566 target->ToPlayer()->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest);
567
568 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS: Player guidLow {} credited quest {}",
569 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
570 }
571 }
572 break;
573 }
574 case SMART_ACTION_CAST:
575 {
576 if (targets.empty())
577 break;
578
579 Unit* caster = me;
580 // Areatrigger Cast!
581 if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER)
582 caster = unit->SummonTrigger(unit->GetPositionX(), unit->GetPositionY(), unit->GetPositionZ(), unit->GetOrientation(), 5000);
583
584 if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit > 0 && targets.size() > e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
585 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
586
587 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
588 {
589 // may be nullptr
590 if (go)
591 {
592 go->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell);
593 }
594
595 if (!IsUnit(target))
596 continue;
597
598 if (caster && caster != me) // Areatrigger cast
599 {
600 caster->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
601 }
602 else if (me && (!(e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell)))
603 {
604 if (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
605 me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
606
607 // Xinef: flag usable only if caster has max dist set
608 if ((e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE) && GetCasterMaxDist() > 0.0f && me->GetMaxPower(GetCasterPowerType()) > 0)
609 {
610 // Xinef: check mana case only and operate movement accordingly, LoS and range is checked in targetet movement generator
611 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.cast.spell);
612 int32 currentPower = me->GetPower(GetCasterPowerType());
613
614 if ((spellInfo && (currentPower < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()) || me->IsSpellProhibited(spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))) || me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
615 {
616 SetCasterActualDist(0);
617 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(0);
618 }
619 else if (GetCasterActualDist() == 0.0f && me->GetPowerPct(GetCasterPowerType()) > 30.0f)
620 {
621 RestoreCasterMaxDist();
622 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(GetCasterActualDist());
623 }
624 }
625
626 me->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
627 }
628 }
629
630 break;
631 }
632 case SMART_ACTION_INVOKER_CAST:
633 {
634 Unit* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker(unit); // xinef: can be used for area triggers cast
635 if (!tempLastInvoker)
636 break;
637
638 if (targets.empty())
639 break;
640
641 if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit > 0 && targets.size() > e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
642 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
643
644 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
645 {
646 if (!IsUnit(target))
647 continue;
648
649 if (!(e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
650 {
651 if (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
652 tempLastInvoker->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
653
654 tempLastInvoker->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
655 }
656 }
657
658 break;
659 }
660 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA:
661 {
662 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
663 {
664 if (IsUnit(target))
665 {
666 target->ToUnit()->AddAura(e.action.cast.spell, target->ToUnit());
667 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA: Adding aura {} to unit {}",
668 e.action.cast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString());
669 }
670 }
671 break;
672 }
673 case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT:
674 {
675 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
676 {
677 if (IsGameObject(target))
678 {
679 GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject();
680
681 // Activate
682 if (go->GetGoType() != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR)
683 {
684 go->SetLootState(GO_READY);
685 }
686
687 go->UseDoorOrButton(0, !!e.action.activateObject.alternative, unit);
688 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT. Gameobject {} activated", go->GetGUID().ToString());
689 }
690 }
691
692 break;
693 }
694 case SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT:
695 {
696 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
697 {
698 if (IsGameObject(target))
699 {
700 target->ToGameObject()->ResetDoorOrButton();
701 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT. Gameobject {} (entry: {}) reset",
702 target->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetEntry());
703 }
704 }
705 break;
706 }
707 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE:
708 {
709 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
710 {
711 if (IsUnit(target))
712 {
713 target->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, e.action.emote.emote);
714 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE. Unit {} set emotestate to {}",
715 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.emote.emote);
716 }
717 }
718 break;
719 }
720 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG:
721 {
722 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
723 {
724 if (IsUnit(target))
725 {
726 if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
727 {
728 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
729 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} added flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
730 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
731 }
732 else
733 {
734 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
735 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} added flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
736 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
737 }
738 }
739 }
740 break;
741 }
742 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG:
743 {
744 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
745 {
746 if (IsUnit(target))
747 {
748 if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
749 {
750 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
751 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} removed flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
752 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
753 }
754 else
755 {
756 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
757 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} removed flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
758 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
759 }
760 }
761 }
762 break;
763 }
764 case SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK:
765 {
766 if (!IsSmart())
767 break;
768
769 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetAutoAttack(e.action.autoAttack.attack);
770 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK: Creature: {} bool on = {}",
771 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.autoAttack.attack);
772 break;
773 }
774 case SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT:
775 {
776 if (!IsSmart())
777 break;
778
779 // Xinef: Fix Combat Movement
780 bool move = e.action.combatMove.move;
781 if (move && GetMaxCombatDist() && e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT)
782 {
783 SetActualCombatDist(0);
784 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(0);
785 }
786 else
787 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(move);
788 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT: Creature {} bool on = {}",
789 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.combatMove.move);
790 break;
791 }
792 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE:
793 {
794 if (!GetBaseObject())
795 break;
796
797 SetPhase(e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
798 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE: Creature {} set event phase {}",
799 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
800 break;
801 }
802 case SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE:
803 {
804 if (!GetBaseObject())
805 break;
806
807 IncPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.inc);
808 DecPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
809 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE: Creature {} inc event phase by {}, "
810 "decrease by {}", GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.incEventPhase.inc, e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
811 break;
812 }
813 case SMART_ACTION_EVADE:
814 {
815 if (!GetBaseObject())
816 break;
817
818 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
819 if (IsCreature(target))
820 if (target->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
821 target->ToCreature()->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
822
823 break;
824 }
825 case SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST:
826 {
827 // Xinef: do not allow to flee without control (stun, fear etc)
828 if (!me || me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_LOST_CONTROL) || me->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN) < 0.1f)
829 break;
830
831 me->DoFleeToGetAssistance();
832 if (e.action.flee.withEmote)
833 {
834 Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(me, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST, me->getGender());
835 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(me, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
836 }
837 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST: Creature {} DoFleeToGetAssistance", me->GetGUID().ToString());
838 break;
839 }
840 case SMART_ACTION_COMBAT_STOP:
841 {
842 if (!me)
843 break;
844
845 me->CombatStop(true);
846 break;
847 }
848 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS:
849 {
850 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
851 {
852 if (!IsUnit(target))
853 continue;
854
855 Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit();
856 // If invoker was pet or charm
857 Player* player = unitTarget->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
858 if (player && GetBaseObject())
859 {
860 player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
861 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS: Player {}, group credit for quest {}",
862 unit->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
863 }
864
865 // Special handling for vehicles
866 if (Vehicle* vehicle = unitTarget->GetVehicleKit())
867 {
868 for (auto& Seat : vehicle->Seats)
869 {
870 if (Player* player = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*unitTarget, Seat.second.Passenger.Guid))
871 {
872 player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
873 }
874 }
875 }
876 }
877 break;
878 }
879 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL:
880 {
881 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
882 {
883 if (!IsUnit(target))
884 continue;
885
886 if (e.action.removeAura.spell)
887 {
888 if (e.action.removeAura.charges)
889 {
890 if (Aura* aur = target->ToUnit()->GetAura(e.action.removeAura.spell))
891 aur->ModCharges(-static_cast<int32>(e.action.removeAura.charges), AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE);
892 }
893 else
894 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(e.action.removeAura.spell);
895 }
896 else
897 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAllAuras();
898
899 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL: Unit {}, spell {}",
900 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.removeAura.spell);
901 }
902 break;
903 }
904 case SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW:
905 {
906 if (!IsSmart())
907 break;
908
909 if (targets.empty())
910 {
911 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopFollow(false);
912 break;
913 }
914
915 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
916 {
917 if (IsUnit(target))
918 {
919 float angle = e.action.follow.angle > 6 ? (e.action.follow.angle * M_PI / 180.0f) : e.action.follow.angle;
920 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFollow(target->ToUnit(), float(e.action.follow.dist) + 0.1f, angle, e.action.follow.credit, e.action.follow.entry, e.action.follow.creditType, e.action.follow.aliveState);
921 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW: Creature {} following target {}",
922 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
923 break;
924 }
925 }
926 break;
927 }
928 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE:
929 {
930 if (!GetBaseObject())
931 break;
932
933 std::vector<uint32> phases;
934 std::copy_if(e.action.randomPhase.phases.begin(), e.action.randomPhase.phases.end(),
935 std::back_inserter(phases), [](uint32 phase) { return phase != 0; });
936
937 uint32 phase = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(phases);
938 SetPhase(phase);
939 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE: Creature {} sets event phase to {}",
940 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), phase);
941 break;
942 }
943 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE:
944 {
945 if (!GetBaseObject())
946 break;
947
948 uint32 phase = urand(e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMin, e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMax);
949 SetPhase(phase);
950 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE: Creature {} sets event phase to {}",
951 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), phase);
952 break;
953 }
954 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER:
955 {
956 if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
957 {
958 unit->ToPlayer()->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, unit);
959 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: (trigger == true) Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
960 unit->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
961 }
962 else if (e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_NONE || e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_SELF) // Loot recipient and his group members
963 {
964 if (!me)
965 break;
966
967 if (Player* player = me->GetLootRecipient())
968 {
969 player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
970 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
971 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
972 }
973 }
974 else // Specific target type
975 {
976 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
977 {
978 if (!IsUnit(target))
979 continue;
980
981 Player* player = target->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
982 if (!player)
983 continue;
984
985 player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
986 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
987 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
988 }
989 }
990 break;
991 }
992 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA:
993 {
994 WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
995 if (!obj)
996 obj = unit;
997
998 if (!obj)
999 break;
1000
1001 InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1002 if (!instance)
1003 {
1004 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: Event {} attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid {}", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1005 break;
1006 }
1007
1008 switch (e.action.setInstanceData.type)
1009 {
1010 case 0:
1011 {
1012 instance->SetData(e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1013 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: Field: {}, data: {}", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1014 } break;
1015 case 1:
1016 {
1017 instance->SetBossState(e.action.setInstanceData.field, static_cast<EncounterState>(e.action.setInstanceData.data));
1018 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: SetBossState BossId: {}, State: {} ({})", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data, InstanceScript::GetBossStateName(e.action.setInstanceData.data));
1019 } break;
1020 default:
1021 {
1022 break;
1023 }
1024 }
1025 break;
1026 }
1027 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64:
1028 {
1029 WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
1030 if (!obj)
1031 obj = unit;
1032
1033 if (!obj)
1034 break;
1035
1036 InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1037 if (!instance)
1038 {
1039 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Event {} attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid {}", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1040 break;
1041 }
1042
1043 if (targets.empty())
1044 break;
1045
1046 instance->SetGuidData(e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets.front()->GetGUID());
1047 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64: Field: {}, data: {}",
1048 e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets.front()->GetGUID().ToString());
1049 break;
1050 }
1051 case SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE:
1052 {
1053 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1054 if (IsCreature(target))
1055 target->ToCreature()->UpdateEntry(e.action.updateTemplate.creature, target->ToCreature()->GetCreatureData(), e.action.updateTemplate.updateLevel != 0);
1056 break;
1057 }
1058 case SMART_ACTION_DIE:
1059 {
1060 if (me && !me->isDead())
1061 {
1062 Unit::Kill(me, me);
1063 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_DIE: Creature {}", me->GetGUID().ToString());
1064 }
1065 break;
1066 }
1067 case SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE:
1068 {
1069 if (targets.empty())
1070 break;
1071
1072 if (!me->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
1073 {
1074 ObjectVector units;
1075 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitRange.maxDist));
1076
1077 if (!units.empty() && GetBaseObject())
1078 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
1079 if (IsPlayer(unit) && !unit->ToPlayer()->isDead())
1080 {
1081 me->SetInCombatWith(unit->ToPlayer());
1082 unit->ToPlayer()->SetInCombatWith(me);
1083 me->AddThreat(unit->ToPlayer(), 0.0f);
1084 }
1085 }
1086 else
1087 {
1088 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1089 {
1090 if (IsCreature(target))
1091 {
1092 target->ToCreature()->SetInCombatWithZone();
1093 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE: Creature {}, target: {}",
1094 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
1095 }
1096 }
1097 }
1098
1099 break;
1100 }
1101 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP:
1102 {
1103 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1104 {
1105 if (IsCreature(target))
1106 {
1107 target->ToCreature()->CallForHelp(float(e.action.callHelp.range));
1108 if (e.action.callHelp.withEmote)
1109 {
1110 Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(target, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_CALL_FOR_HELP, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr);
1111 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(target, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
1112 }
1113 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP: Creature {}, target: {}",
1114 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
1115 }
1116 }
1117 break;
1118 }
1119 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH:
1120 {
1121 if (me)
1122 {
1123 me->SetSheath(SheathState(e.action.setSheath.sheath));
1124 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH: Creature {}, State: {}",
1125 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.setSheath.sheath);
1126 }
1127 break;
1128 }
1129 case SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN:
1130 {
1131 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1132 {
1133 Milliseconds despawnDelay(e.action.forceDespawn.delay);
1134
1135 // Wait at least one world update tick before despawn, so it doesn't break linked actions.
1136 if (despawnDelay <= 0ms)
1137 {
1138 despawnDelay = 1ms;
1139 }
1140
1141 Seconds forceRespawnTimer(e.action.forceDespawn.forceRespawnTimer);
1142 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1143 {
1144 creature->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1145 }
1146 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1147 {
1148 go->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1149 }
1150 }
1151
1152 break;
1153 }
1154 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INGAME_PHASE_MASK:
1155 {
1156 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1157 {
1158 if (IsUnit(target))
1159 target->ToUnit()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1160 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1161 target->ToGameObject()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1162 }
1163 break;
1164 }
1165 case SMART_ACTION_MOUNT_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
1166 {
1167 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1168 {
1169 if (!IsUnit(target))
1170 continue;
1171
1172 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
1173 {
1174 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature > 0)
1175 {
1176 if (CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
1177 target->ToUnit()->Mount(ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(cInfo));
1178 }
1179 else
1180 target->ToUnit()->Mount(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
1181 }
1182 else
1183 target->ToUnit()->Dismount();
1184 }
1185 break;
1186 }
1187 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INVINCIBILITY_HP_LEVEL:
1188 {
1189 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1190 {
1191 if (IsCreature(target))
1192 {
1193 SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI());
1194 if (!ai)
1195 continue;
1196
1197 if (e.action.invincHP.percent)
1198 ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel(target->ToCreature()->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.invincHP.percent));
1199 else
1200 ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel(e.action.invincHP.minHP);
1201 }
1202 }
1203 break;
1204 }
1205 case SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA:
1206 {
1207 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1208 {
1209 if (IsCreature(target))
1210 target->ToCreature()->AI()->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1211 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1212 target->ToGameObject()->AI()->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1213 }
1214 break;
1215 }
1216 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD:
1217 {
1218 if (!me)
1219 break;
1220
1221 float x, y, z;
1222 me->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, me->GetObjectSize() / 3, (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1223 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, x, y, z);
1224 break;
1225 }
1226 case SMART_ACTION_RISE_UP:
1227 {
1228 if (!me)
1229 break;
1230
1231 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ() + (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1232 break;
1233 }
1234 case SMART_ACTION_SET_VISIBILITY:
1235 {
1236 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1237 if (IsUnit(target))
1238 target->ToUnit()->SetVisible(!!e.action.visibility.state);
1239
1240 break;
1241 }
1242 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ACTIVE:
1243 {
1244 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1245 target->setActive(!!e.action.setActive.state);
1246 break;
1247 }
1248 case SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_START:
1249 {
1250 if (!me)
1251 break;
1252
1253 if (targets.empty())
1254 break;
1255
1256 // attack random target
1257 if (Unit* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets)->ToUnit())
1258 me->AI()->AttackStart(target);
1259 break;
1260 }
1261 case SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_STOP:
1262 {
1263 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1264 if (Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit())
1265 unitTarget->AttackStop();
1266 break;
1267 }
1268 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE:
1269 {
1270 WorldObject* summoner = GetBaseObject() ? GetBaseObject() : unit;
1271 if (!summoner)
1272 break;
1273
1274 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
1275 {
1276 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1277 Position randomPoint;
1278 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1279 for (uint32 i = 0; i < e.target.randomPoint.amount; i++)
1280 {
1281 if (e.target.randomPoint.self > 0)
1282 randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(me->GetPosition(), range);
1283 else
1284 randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1285 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, randomPoint, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1286 {
1287 if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1288 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1289 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1290 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1291 }
1292 }
1293 break;
1294 }
1295
1296 float x, y, z, o;
1297 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1298 {
1299 target->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1300 x += e.target.x;
1301 y += e.target.y;
1302 z += e.target.z;
1303 o += e.target.o;
1304 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, x, y, z, o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1305 {
1306 if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker == 2) // pussywizard: proper attackInvoker implementation
1307 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1308 else if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1309 summon->AI()->AttackStart(target->ToUnit());
1310 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1311 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1312 }
1313 }
1314
1315 if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1316 break;
1317
1318 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1319 {
1320 if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1321 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1322 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1323 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1324 }
1325 break;
1326 }
1327 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO:
1328 {
1329 if (!GetBaseObject())
1330 break;
1331
1332 if (!targets.empty())
1333 {
1334 float x, y, z, o;
1335 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1336 {
1337 // xinef: allow gameobjects to summon gameobjects!
1338 //if(!IsUnit((*itr)))
1339 // continue;
1340
1341 target->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1342 x += e.target.x;
1343 y += e.target.y;
1344 z += e.target.z;
1345 o += e.target.o;
1346 if (!e.action.summonGO.targetsummon)
1347 GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, x, y, z, o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1348 else
1349 target->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, GetBaseObject()->GetPositionX(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionY(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionZ(), GetBaseObject()->GetOrientation(), 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1350 }
1351 }
1352
1353 if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1354 break;
1355
1356 GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1357 break;
1358 }
1359 case SMART_ACTION_KILL_UNIT:
1360 {
1361 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1362 {
1363 if (!IsUnit(target))
1364 continue;
1365
1366 Unit::Kill(target->ToUnit(), target->ToUnit());
1367 }
1368
1369 break;
1370 }
1371 case SMART_ACTION_INSTALL_AI_TEMPLATE:
1372 {
1373 InstallTemplate(e);
1374 break;
1375 }
1376 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_ITEM:
1377 {
1378 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1379 {
1380 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1381 continue;
1382
1383 target->ToPlayer()->AddItem(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count);
1384 }
1385 break;
1386 }
1387 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ITEM:
1388 {
1389 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1390 {
1391 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1392 continue;
1393
1394 target->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count, true);
1395 }
1396 break;
1397 }
1398 case SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST:
1399 {
1400 StoreTargetList(targets, e.action.storeTargets.id);
1401 break;
1402 }
1403 case SMART_ACTION_TELEPORT:
1404 {
1405 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1406 {
1407 if (IsPlayer(target))
1408 target->ToPlayer()->TeleportTo(e.action.teleport.mapID, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1409 else if (IsCreature(target))
1410 target->ToCreature()->NearTeleportTo(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1411 }
1412 break;
1413 }
1414 case SMART_ACTION_SET_FLY:
1415 {
1416 if (!IsSmart())
1417 break;
1418
1419 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFly(e.action.setFly.fly);
1420 // Xinef: Set speed if any
1421 if (e.action.setFly.speed)
1422 me->SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, float(e.action.setFly.speed / 100.0f), true);
1423
1424 // Xinef: this wil be executed only if state is different
1425 me->SetDisableGravity(e.action.setFly.disableGravity);
1426 break;
1427 }
1428 case SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN:
1429 {
1430 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1431 {
1432 if (IsCreature(target))
1433 {
1434 if (IsSmart(target->ToCreature()))
1435 CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI())->SetRun(e.action.setRun.run);
1436 else
1437 target->ToCreature()->SetWalk(e.action.setRun.run ? false : true); // Xinef: reversed
1438 }
1439 }
1440
1441 break;
1442 }
1443 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SWIM:
1444 {
1445 if (!IsSmart())
1446 break;
1447
1448 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetSwim(e.action.setSwim.swim);
1449 break;
1450 }
1451 case SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER:
1452 {
1453 if (!targets.empty())
1454 {
1455 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1456 {
1457 if (IsCreature(target))
1458 {
1459 if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI()))
1460 ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1461 else
1462 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartAI, skipping");
1463 }
1464 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1465 {
1466 if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, target->ToGameObject()->AI()))
1467 ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1468 else
1469 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
1470 }
1471 }
1472 }
1473 else
1474 StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1475 break;
1476 }
1477 case SMART_ACTION_WP_START:
1478 {
1479 if (!IsSmart())
1480 break;
1481
1482 bool run = e.action.wpStart.run != 0;
1483 uint32 entry = e.action.wpStart.pathID;
1484 bool repeat = e.action.wpStart.repeat != 0;
1485
1486 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1487 {
1488 if (IsPlayer(target))
1489 {
1490 StoreTargetList(targets, SMART_ESCORT_TARGETS);
1491 break;
1492 }
1493 }
1494
1495 me->SetReactState((ReactStates)e.action.wpStart.reactState);
1496 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StartPath(run, entry, repeat, unit);
1497
1498 uint32 quest = e.action.wpStart.quest;
1499 uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStart.despawnTime;
1500 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->mEscortQuestID = quest;
1501 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetDespawnTime(DespawnTime);
1502 break;
1503 }
1504 case SMART_ACTION_WP_PAUSE:
1505 {
1506 if (!IsSmart())
1507 break;
1508
1509 uint32 delay = e.action.wpPause.delay;
1510 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->PausePath(delay, e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_REACHED ? false : true);
1511 break;
1512 }
1513 case SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP:
1514 {
1515 if (!IsSmart())
1516 break;
1517
1518 uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStop.despawnTime;
1519 uint32 quest = e.action.wpStop.quest;
1520 bool fail = e.action.wpStop.fail;
1521 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopPath(DespawnTime, quest, fail);
1522 break;
1523 }
1524 case SMART_ACTION_WP_RESUME:
1525 {
1526 if (!IsSmart())
1527 break;
1528
1529 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetWPPauseTimer(0);
1530 break;
1531 }
1532 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION:
1533 {
1534 if (!me)
1535 break;
1536
1537 if (e.action.orientation.random > 0)
1538 {
1539 float randomOri = frand(0.0f, 2 * M_PI);
1540 me->SetFacingTo(randomOri);
1541 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1542 me->SetOrientation(randomOri);
1543 break;
1544 }
1545
1546 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF)
1547 {
1548 me->SetFacingTo((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1549 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1550 me->SetOrientation((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1551 }
1552 else if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1553 {
1554 me->SetFacingTo(e.target.o);
1555 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1556 me->SetOrientation(e.target.o);
1557 }
1558 else if (!targets.empty())
1559 {
1560 me->SetFacingToObject(*targets.begin());
1561 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1562 me->SetInFront(*targets.begin());
1563 }
1564
1565 break;
1566 }
1567 case SMART_ACTION_PLAYMOVIE:
1568 {
1569 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1570 {
1571 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1572 continue;
1573
1574 target->ToPlayer()->SendMovieStart(e.action.movie.entry);
1575 }
1576 break;
1577 }
1578 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS:
1579 {
1580 if (!IsSmart())
1581 break;
1582
1583 WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1584
1585 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
1586 {
1587 if (me)
1588 {
1589 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1590 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1591 Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1592 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(
1593 e.action.moveToPos.pointId,
1594 randomPoint.m_positionX,
1595 randomPoint.m_positionY,
1596 randomPoint.m_positionZ,
1597 true,
1598 true,
1599 isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE
1600 );
1601 }
1602
1603 break;
1604 }
1605
