1606 /*if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID ||
1607 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE ||
1608 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE ||
1609 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT ||
1610 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER ||
1611 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY ||
1612 e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_STORED) // Xinef: bieda i rozpierdol TC)*/
1613 {
1614 // we want to move to random element
1615 if (!targets.empty())
1616 target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets);
1617 }
1618
1619 if (!target)
1620 {
1621 G3D::Vector3 dest(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z);
1622 if (e.action.moveToPos.transport)
1623 if (TransportBase* trans = me->GetDirectTransport())
1624 trans->CalculatePassengerPosition(dest.x, dest.y, dest.z);
1625
1626 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, dest.x, dest.y, dest.z, true, true,
1627 isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE, e.target.o);
1628 }
1629 else // Xinef: we can use dest.x, dest.y, dest.z to make offset
1630 {
1631 float x, y, z;
1632 target->GetPosition(x, y, z);
1633 if (e.action.moveToPos.ContactDistance > 0)
1634 target->GetContactPoint(me, x, y, z, e.action.moveToPos.ContactDistance);
1635 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, x + e.target.x, y + e.target.y, z + e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1636 }
1637 break;
1638 }
1639 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS_TARGET:
1640 {
1641 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1642 {
1643 if (IsCreature(target))
1644 {
1645 Creature* ctarget = target->ToCreature();
1646 ctarget->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1647 }
1648 }
1649
1650 break;
1651 }
1652 case SMART_ACTION_RESPAWN_TARGET:
1653 {
1654 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1655 {
1656 if (IsCreature(target))
1657 target->ToCreature()->Respawn();
1658 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1659 {
1660 // do not modify respawndelay of already spawned gameobjects
1661 if (target->ToGameObject()->isSpawnedByDefault())
1662 target->ToGameObject()->Respawn();
1663 else
1664 target->ToGameObject()->SetRespawnTime(e.action.RespawnTarget.goRespawnTime);
1665 }
1666 }
1667 break;
1668 }
1669 case SMART_ACTION_CLOSE_GOSSIP:
1670 {
1671 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1672 if (IsPlayer(target))
1673 target->ToPlayer()->PlayerTalkClass->SendCloseGossip();
1674 break;
1675 }
1676 case SMART_ACTION_EQUIP:
1677 {
1678 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1679 {
1680 if (Creature* npc = target->ToCreature())
1681 {
1682 std::array<uint32, MAX_EQUIPMENT_ITEMS> slot;
1683 if (int8 equipId = static_cast<int8>(e.action.equip.entry))
1684 {
1685 EquipmentInfo const* eInfo = sObjectMgr->GetEquipmentInfo(npc->GetEntry(), equipId);
1686 if (!eInfo)
1687 {
1688 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: SMART_ACTION_EQUIP uses non-existent equipment info id {} for creature {}", equipId, npc->GetEntry());
1689 break;
1690 }
1691
1692 npc->SetCurrentEquipmentId(equipId);
1693
1694 std::copy(std::begin(eInfo->ItemEntry), std::end(eInfo->ItemEntry), std::begin(slot));
1695 }
1696 else
1697 std::copy(std::begin(e.action.equip.slots), std::end(e.action.equip.slots), std::begin(slot));
1698
1699 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EQUIPMENT_ITEMS; ++i)
1700 if (!e.action.equip.mask || (e.action.equip.mask & (1 << i)))
1701 npc->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i, slot[i]);
1702 }
1703 }
1704 break;
1705 }
1706 case SMART_ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT:
1707 {
1708 SmartEvent ne = SmartEvent();
1709 ne.type = (SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
1710 ne.event_chance = e.action.timeEvent.chance;
1711 if (!ne.event_chance) ne.event_chance = 100;
1712
1713 ne.minMaxRepeat.min = e.action.timeEvent.min;
1714 ne.minMaxRepeat.max = e.action.timeEvent.max;
1715 ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMin;
1716 ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMax;
1717
1718 ne.event_flags = 0;
1719 if (!ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin && !ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax)
1720 ne.event_flags |= SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE;
1721
1722 SmartAction ac = SmartAction();
1723 ac.type = (SMART_ACTION)SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT;
1724 ac.timeEvent.id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
1725
1726 SmartScriptHolder ev = SmartScriptHolder();
1727 ev.event = ne;
1728 ev.event_id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
1729 ev.target = e.target;
1730 ev.action = ac;
1731 InitTimer(ev);
1732 mStoredEvents.push_back(ev);
1733 break;
1734 }
1735 case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT:
1736 ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, e.action.timeEvent.id);
1737
1738 // xinef: remove this event if not repeatable
1739 if (e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE)
1740 mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
1741 break;
1742 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_TIMED_EVENT:
1743 mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
1744 break;
1745 case SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
1746 {
1747 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1748 {
1749 if (IsCreature(target))
1750 {
1751 if (!meOrigGUID)
1752 meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
1753 if (!goOrigGUID)
1754 goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
1755 go = nullptr;
1756 me = target->ToCreature();
1757 break;
1758 }
1759 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1760 {
1761 if (!meOrigGUID)
1762 meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
1763 if (!goOrigGUID)
1764 goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
1765 go = target->ToGameObject();
1766 me = nullptr;
1767 break;
1768 }
1769 }
1770
1771 break;
1772 }
1773 case SMART_ACTION_RESET_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
1774 ResetBaseObject();
1775 break;
1776 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_SCRIPT_RESET:
1777 OnReset();
1778 break;
1779 case SMART_ACTION_SET_RANGED_MOVEMENT:
1780 {
1781 if (!IsSmart())
1782 break;
1783
1784 float attackDistance = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.distance);
1785 float attackAngle = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.angle) / 180.0f * float(M_PI);
1786
1787 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1788 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1789 if (IsSmart(creature) && creature->GetVictim())
1790 if (CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->CanCombatMove())
1791 creature->GetMotionMaster()->MoveChase(creature->GetVictim(), attackDistance, attackAngle);
1792
1793 break;
1794 }
1795 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
1796 {
1797 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
1798 {
1799 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
1800 break;
1801 }
1802
1803 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1804 {
1805 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1806 {
1807 if (IsSmart(creature))
1808 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
1809 }
1810 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1811 {
1812 if (IsSmartGO(go))
1813 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
1814 }
1815 }
1816 break;
1817 }
1818 case SMART_ACTION_SET_NPC_FLAG:
1819 {
1820 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1821 if (IsCreature(target))
1822 target->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
1823 break;
1824 }
1825 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_NPC_FLAG:
1826 {
1827 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1828 if (IsCreature(target))
1829 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
1830 break;
1831 }
1832 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_NPC_FLAG:
1833 {
1834 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1835 if (IsCreature(target))
1836 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
1837 break;
1838 }
1839 case SMART_ACTION_CROSS_CAST:
1840 {
1841 if (targets.empty())
1842 break;
1843
1844 ObjectVector casters;
1845 GetTargets(casters, CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, (SMARTAI_TARGETS)e.action.crossCast.targetType, e.action.crossCast.targetParam1, e.action.crossCast.targetParam2, e.action.crossCast.targetParam3, 0, 0), unit);
1846
1847 for (WorldObject* caster : casters)
1848 {
1849 if (!IsUnit(caster))
1850 continue;
1851
1852 Unit* casterUnit = caster->ToUnit();
1853
1854 bool interruptedSpell = false;
1855
1856 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1857 {
1858 if (!IsUnit(target))
1859 continue;
1860
1861 if (!(e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.crossCast.spell))
1862 {
1863 if (!interruptedSpell && e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
1864 {
1865 casterUnit->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
1866 interruptedSpell = true;
1867 }
1868
1869 casterUnit->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.crossCast.spell, (e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) != 0);
1870 }
1871 else
1872 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "Spell {} not cast because it has flag SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT and the target ({}) already has the aura", e.action.crossCast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString());
1873 }
1874 }
1875 break;
1876 }
1877 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
1878 {
1879 std::vector<uint32> actionLists;
1880 std::copy_if(e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists.begin(), e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists.end(),
1881 std::back_inserter(actionLists), [](uint32 actionList) { return actionList != 0; });
1882
1883 uint32 id = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(actionLists);
1884 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
1885 {
1886 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
1887 break;
1888 }
1889
1890 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1891 {
1892 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1893 {
1894 if (IsSmart(creature))
1895 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
1896 }
1897 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1898 {
1899 if (IsSmartGO(go))
1900 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
1901 }
1902 }
1903 break;
1904 }
1905 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_RANGE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
1906 {
1907 uint32 id = urand(e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists[0], e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists[1]);
1908 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
1909 {
1910 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
1911 break;
1912 }
1913
1914 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1915 {
1916 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1917 {
1918 if (IsSmart(creature))
1919 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
1920 }
1921 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1922 {
1923 if (IsSmartGO(go))
1924 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
1925 }
1926 }
1927 break;
1928 }
1929 case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_TAXI:
1930 {
1931 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1932 if (IsPlayer(target))
1933 target->ToPlayer()->ActivateTaxiPathTo(e.action.taxi.id);
1934 break;
1935 }
1936 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MOVE:
1937 {
1938 bool foundTarget = false;
1939
1940 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1941 {
1942 if (IsCreature((target)))
1943 {
1944 foundTarget = true;
1945
1946 if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
1947 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom(float(e.action.moveRandom.distance));
1948 else
1949 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
1950 }
1951 }
1952
1953 if (!foundTarget && me && IsCreature(me) && me->IsAlive())
1954 {
1955 if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
1956 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom(float(e.action.moveRandom.distance));
1957 else
1958 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
1959 }
1960 break;
1961 }
1962 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
1963 {
1964 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1965 if (IsUnit(target))
1966 target->ToUnit()->SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.setunitByte.type, e.action.setunitByte.byte1);
1967 break;
1968 }
1969 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
1970 {
1971 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1972 if (IsUnit(target))
1973 target->ToUnit()->RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.delunitByte.type, e.action.delunitByte.byte1);
1974 break;
1975 }
1976 case SMART_ACTION_INTERRUPT_SPELL:
1977 {
1978 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1979 if (IsUnit(target))
1980 target->ToUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withDelayed != 0, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.spell_id, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withInstant != 0);
1981 break;
1982 }
1983 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GO_CUSTOM_ANIM:
1984 {
1985 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1986 if (IsGameObject(target))
1987 target->ToGameObject()->SendCustomAnim(e.action.sendGoCustomAnim.anim);
1988 break;
1989 }
1990 case SMART_ACTION_SET_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
1991 {
1992 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1993 if (IsUnit(target))
1994 target->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
1995 break;
1996 }
1997 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
1998 {
1999 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2000 if (IsUnit(target))
2001 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2002 break;
2003 }
2004 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2005 {
2006 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2007 if (IsUnit(target))
2008 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2009 break;
2010 }
2011 case SMART_ACTION_JUMP_TO_POS:
2012 {
2013 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
2014 {
2015 if (me)
2016 {
2017 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
2018 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
2019 Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
2020 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(randomPoint, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2021 }
2022
2023 break;
2024 }
2025
2026 if (targets.empty())
2027 break;
2028
2029 // xinef: my implementation
2030 if (e.action.jump.selfJump)
2031 {
2032 if (WorldObject* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets))
2033 if (me)
2034 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(target->GetPositionX() + e.target.x, target->GetPositionY() + e.target.y, target->GetPositionZ() + e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2035 }
2036 else
2037 {
2038 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2039 if (WorldObject* obj = (target))
2040 {
2041 if (Creature* creature = obj->ToCreature())
2042 creature->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2043 }
2044 }
2045
2046 break;
2047 }
2048 case SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_LOOT_STATE:
2049 {
2050 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2051 if (IsGameObject(target))
2052 target->ToGameObject()->SetLootState((LootState)e.action.setGoLootState.state);
2053 break;
2054 }
2055 case SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_GO_STATE:
2056 {
2057 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2058 if (IsGameObject(target))
2059 target->ToGameObject()->SetGoState((GOState)e.action.goState.state);
2060 break;
2061 }
2062 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET:
2063 {
2064 WorldObject* ref = GetBaseObject();
2065
2066 if (!ref)
2067 ref = unit;
2068
2069 if (!ref)
2070 break;
2071
2072 ObjectVector const* storedTargets = GetStoredTargetVector(e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id, *ref);
2073 if (!storedTargets)
2074 break;
2075
2076 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2077 {
2078 if (IsCreature(target))
2079 {
2080 if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI()))
2081 ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(ObjectVector(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2082 else
2083 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartAI, skipping");
2084 }
2085 else if (IsGameObject(target))
2086 {
2087 if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, target->ToGameObject()->AI()))
2088 ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(ObjectVector(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2089 else
2090 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
2091 }
2092 }
2093 break;
2094 }
2095 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU:
2096 {
2097 if (!GetBaseObject())
2098 break;
2099
2100 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU: gossipMenuId {}, gossipNpcTextId {}",
2101 e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId);
2102
2103 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2104 if (Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
2105 {
2106 if (e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId)
2107 player->PrepareGossipMenu(GetBaseObject(), e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, true);
2108 else
2109 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
2110
2111 SendGossipMenuFor(player, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId, GetBaseObject()->GetGUID());
2112 }
2113
2114 break;
2115 }
2116 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOME_POS:
2117 {
2118 if (!targets.empty())
2119 {
2120 float x, y, z, o;
2121 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2122 if (IsCreature(target))
2123 {
2124 if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2125 {
2126 target->ToCreature()->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2127 target->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2128 }
2129 else
2130 target->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), target->GetOrientation());
2131 }
2132 }
2133 else if (me && e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
2134 {
2135 if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2136 {
2137 float x, y, z, o;
2138 me->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2139 me->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2140 }
2141 else
2142 me->SetHomePosition(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
2143 }
2144 break;
2145 }
2146 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_REGEN:
2147 {
2148 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2149 if (IsCreature(target))
2150 target->ToCreature()->SetRegeneratingHealth(e.action.setHealthRegen.regenHealth);
2151
2152 break;
2153 }
2154 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ROOT:
2155 {
2156 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2157 if (IsCreature(target))
2158 target->ToCreature()->SetControlled(e.action.setRoot.root != 0, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
2159 break;
2160 }
2161 case SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_FLAG:
2162 {
2163 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2164 if (IsGameObject(target))
2165 target->ToGameObject()->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2166 break;
2167 }
2168 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_GO_FLAG:
2169 {
2170 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2171 if (IsGameObject(target))
2172 target->ToGameObject()->SetFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2173 break;
2174 }
2175 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_GO_FLAG:
2176 {
2177 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2178 if (IsGameObject(target))
2179 target->ToGameObject()->RemoveFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2180 break;
2181 }
2182 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE_GROUP:
2183 {
2184 std::list<TempSummon*> summonList;
2185 GetBaseObject()->SummonCreatureGroup(e.action.creatureGroup.group, &summonList);
2186
2187 for (std::list<TempSummon*>::const_iterator itr = summonList.begin(); itr != summonList.end(); ++itr)
2188 {
2189 if (unit && e.action.creatureGroup.attackInvoker)
2190 (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
2191 else if (me && e.action.creatureGroup.attackScriptOwner)
2192 (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(me);
2193 }
2194
2195 break;
2196 }
2197 case SMART_ACTION_SET_POWER:
2198 {
2199 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2200 if (IsUnit(target))
2201 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), e.action.power.newPower);
2202 break;
2203 }
2204 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_POWER:
2205 {
2206 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2207 if (IsUnit(target))
2208 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), target->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) + e.action.power.newPower);
2209 break;
2210 }
2211 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_POWER:
2212 {
2213 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2214 if (IsUnit(target))
2215 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), target->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) - e.action.power.newPower);
2216 break;
2217 }
2218 case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP:
2219 {
2220 uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStop.id;
2221 if (!sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2222 {
2223 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP, inactive event (id: {})", eventId);
2224 break;
2225 }
2226 sGameEventMgr->StopEvent(eventId, true);
2227 break;
2228 }
2229 case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START:
2230 {
2231 uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStart.id;
2232 if (sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2233 {
2234 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START, already activated event (id: {})", eventId);
2235 break;
2236 }
2237 sGameEventMgr->StartEvent(eventId, true);
2238 break;
2239 }
2240 case SMART_ACTION_START_CLOSEST_WAYPOINT:
2241 {
2242 std::vector<uint32> waypoints;
2243 std::copy_if(e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wps.begin(), e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wps.end(),
2244 std::back_inserter(waypoints), [](uint32 wp) { return wp != 0; });
2245
2246 float distanceToClosest = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
2247 WayPoint* closestWp = nullptr;
2248
2249 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2250 {
2251 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2252 {
2253 if (IsSmart(creature))
2254 {
2255 for (uint32 wp : waypoints)
2256 {
2257 WPPath* path = sSmartWaypointMgr->GetPath(wp);
2258 if (!path || path->empty())
2259 continue;
2260
2261 auto itrWp = path->find(0);
2262 if (itrWp != path->end())
2263 {
2264 if (WayPoint* wp = itrWp->second)
2265 {
2266 float distToThisPath = creature->GetDistance(wp->x, wp->y, wp->z);
2267 if (distToThisPath < distanceToClosest)
2268 {
2269 distanceToClosest = distToThisPath;
2270 closestWp = wp;
2271 }
2272 }
2273 }
2274 }
2275
2276 if (closestWp)
2277 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->StartPath(false, closestWp->id, true);
2278 }
2279 }
2280 }
2281 break;
2282 }
2283 case SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_STATE:
2284 {
2285 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2286 if (IsGameObject(target))
2287 target->ToGameObject()->SetGoState((GOState)e.action.goState.state);
2288
2289 break;
2290 }
2291 case SMART_ACTION_EXIT_VEHICLE:
2292 {
2293 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2294 if (IsUnit(target))
2295 target->ToUnit()->ExitVehicle();
2296
2297 break;
2298 }
2299 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_MOVEMENT_FLAGS:
2300 {
2301 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2302 if (IsUnit(target))
2303 {
2304 target->ToUnit()->SetUnitMovementFlags(e.action.movementFlag.flag);
2305 target->ToUnit()->SendMovementFlagUpdate();
2306 }
2307
2308 break;
2309 }
2310 case SMART_ACTION_SET_COMBAT_DISTANCE:
2311 {
2312 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2313 if (IsCreature(target))
2314 target->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance = e.action.combatDistance.dist;
2315
2316 break;
2317 }
2318 case SMART_ACTION_SET_CASTER_COMBAT_DIST:
2319 {
2320 if (e.action.casterDistance.reset)
2321 RestoreCasterMaxDist();
2322 else
2323 SetCasterActualDist(e.action.casterDistance.dist);
2324
2325 if (me->GetVictim() && me->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == CHASE_MOTION_TYPE)
2326 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveChase(me->GetVictim(), GetCasterActualDist());
2327 break;
2328 }
2329 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SIGHT_DIST:
2330 {
2331 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2332 if (IsCreature(target))
2333 target->ToCreature()->m_SightDistance = e.action.sightDistance.dist;
2334 break;
2335 }
2336 case SMART_ACTION_FLEE:
2337 {
2338 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2339 if (IsCreature(target))
2340 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(me, e.action.flee.withEmote);
2341 break;
2342 }
2343 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_THREAT:
2344 {
2345 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2346 if (IsUnit(target))
2347 me->AddThreat(target->ToUnit(), float(e.action.threatPCT.threatINC) - float(e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC));
2348 break;
2349 }
2350 case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_EQUIPMENT:
2351 {
2352 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2353 if (IsCreature(target))
2354 target->ToCreature()->LoadEquipment(e.action.loadEquipment.id, e.action.loadEquipment.force != 0);
2355 break;
2356 }
2357 case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_RANDOM_TIMED_EVENT:
2358 {
2359 uint32 eventId = urand(e.action.randomTimedEvent.minId, e.action.randomTimedEvent.maxId);
2360 ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, eventId);
2361 break;
2362 }
2363 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOVER:
2364 {
2365 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2366 if (IsUnit(target))
2367 target->ToUnit()->SetHover(e.action.setHover.state);
2368 break;
2369 }
2370 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_IMMUNITY:
2371 {
2372 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2373 if (IsUnit(target))
2374 target->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, true);
2375
2376 break;
2377 }
2378 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_IMMUNITY:
2379 {
2380 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2381 if (IsUnit(target))
2382 target->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, false);
2383 break;
2384 }
2385 case SMART_ACTION_FALL:
2386 {
2387 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2388 if (IsUnit(target))
2389 target->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
2390
2391 break;
2392 }
2393 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_FLAG_RESET:
2394 {
2395 SetPhaseReset(e.action.setActive.state);
2396 break;
2397 }
2398 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ALL_GAMEOBJECTS:
2399 {
2400 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2401 if (IsUnit(target))
2402 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAllGameObjects();
2403 break;
2404 }
2405 case SMART_ACTION_STOP_MOTION:
2406 {
2407 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2408 {
2409 if (IsUnit(target))
2410 {
2411 if (e.action.stopMotion.stopMovement)
2412 target->ToUnit()->StopMoving();
2413 if (e.action.stopMotion.movementExpired)
2414 target->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
2415 }
2416 }
2417 break;
2418 }
2419 case SMART_ACTION_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPDATE:
2420 {
2421 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2422 if (IsUnit(target))
2423 target->ToUnit()->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD);
2424
2425 break;
2426 }
2427 case SMART_ACTION_ZONE_UNDER_ATTACK:
2428 {
2429 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2430 if (IsUnit(target))
2431 if (Player* player = target->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
2432 {
2433 me->SendZoneUnderAttackMessage(player);
2434 break;
2435 }
2436
2437 break;
2438 }
2439 case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_GRID:
2440 {
2441 if (me && me->FindMap())
2442 me->FindMap()->LoadGrid(e.target.x, e.target.y);
2443 break;
2444 }
2445 case SMART_ACTION_PLAYER_TALK:
2446 {
2447 char const* text = sObjectMgr->GetAcoreString(e.action.playerTalk.textId, DEFAULT_LOCALE);
2448
2449 if (!targets.empty())
2450 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2451 if (IsPlayer(target))
2452 !e.action.playerTalk.flag ? target->ToPlayer()->Say(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL) : target->ToPlayer()->Yell(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL);
2453
2454 break;
2455 }
2456 case SMART_ACTION_CUSTOM_CAST:
2457 {
2458 if (!me)
2459 break;
2460
2461 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2462 {
2463 if (IsUnit(target))
2464 {
2465 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
2466 me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
2467
2468 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE)
2469 {
2470 // If cast flag SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE is set combat movement will not be allowed
2471 // unless target is outside spell range, out of mana, or LOS.
2472
2473 bool _allowMove = false;
2474 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.castCustom.spell); // AssertSpellInfo?
2475 int32 mana = me->GetPower(POWER_MANA);
2476
2477 if (me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) > spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true) ||
2478 me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) < spellInfo->GetMinRange(true) ||
2479 !me->IsWithinLOSInMap(target->ToUnit()) ||
2480 mana < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
2481 _allowMove = true;
2482
2483 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(_allowMove);
2484 }
2485
2486 if (!(e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.castCustom.spell))
2487 {
2488 CustomSpellValues values;
2489 if (e.action.castCustom.bp1)
2490 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, e.action.castCustom.bp1);
2491 if (e.action.castCustom.bp2)
2492 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, e.action.castCustom.bp2);
2493 if (e.action.castCustom.bp3)
2494 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, e.action.castCustom.bp3);
2495 me->CastCustomSpell(e.action.castCustom.spell, values, target->ToUnit(), (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) ? TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK : TRIGGERED_NONE);
2496 }
2497 }
2498 }
2499 break;
2500 }
2501 case SMART_ACTION_VORTEX_SUMMON:
2502 {
2503 if (!me)
2504 break;
2505
2506 if (targets.empty())
2507 break;
2508
2509 TempSummonType summon_type = (e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2510
2511 float a = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.a);
2512 float k = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.k) / 1000.0f;
2513 float r_max = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.r_max);
2514 float delta_phi = M_PI * static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.phi_delta) / 180.0f;
2515
2516 // r(phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi)
2517 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * (phi + delta_phi))
2518 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2519 // r(phi + delta_phi) = r(phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2520 float factor = std::exp(k * delta_phi);
2521
2522 // r(0) = a * e ^ (k * 0) = a * e ^ 0 = a * 1 = a
2523 float summonRadius = a;
2524
2525 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2526 {
2527 // Offset by orientation, should not count into radius calculation,
2528 // but is needed for vortex direction (polar coordinates)
2529 float phi = target->GetOrientation();
2530
2531 do
2532 {
2533 Position summonPosition(*target);
2534 summonPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(phi, summonRadius);
2535
2536 me->SummonCreature(e.action.summonVortex.summonEntry, summonPosition, summon_type, e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration);
2537
2538 phi += delta_phi;
2539 summonRadius *= factor;
2540 } while (summonRadius <= r_max);
2541 }
2542
2543 break;
2544 }
2545 case SMART_ACTION_CONE_SUMMON:
2546 {
2547 if (!me)
2548 break;
2549
2550 TempSummonType spawnType = (e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2551
2552 float distInARow = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenSummons);
2553 float coneAngle = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.coneAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f;
2554
2555 for (uint32 radius = 0; radius <= e.action.coneSummon.coneLength; radius += e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenRings)
2556 {
2557 float deltaAngle = 0.0f;
2558 if (radius > 0)
2559 deltaAngle = distInARow / radius;
2560
2561 uint32 count = 1;
2562 if (deltaAngle > 0)
2563 count += coneAngle / deltaAngle;
2564
2565 float currentAngle = -static_cast<float>(count) * deltaAngle / 2.0f;
2566
2567 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2568 currentAngle += G3D::fuzzyGt(e.target.o, 0.0f) ? (e.target.o - me->GetOrientation()) : 0.0f;
2569 else if (!targets.empty())
2570 {
2571 currentAngle += (me->GetAngle(targets.front()) - me->GetOrientation());
2572 }
2573
2574 for (uint32 index = 0; index < count; ++index)
2575 {
2576 Position spawnPosition(*me);
2577 spawnPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(currentAngle, radius);
2578 currentAngle += deltaAngle;
2579
2580 me->SummonCreature(e.action.coneSummon.summonEntry, spawnPosition, spawnType, e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration);
2581 }
2582 }
2583
2584 break;
2585 }
2586 case SMART_ACTION_CU_ENCOUNTER_START:
2587 {
2588 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2589 {
2590 if (Player* playerTarget = target->ToPlayer())
2591 {
2592 playerTarget->RemoveArenaSpellCooldowns();
2593 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57724); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Sated (Heroism)
2594 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57723); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Exhaustion (Bloodlust)
2595 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(2825); // Bloodlust
2596 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(32182); // Heroism
2597 }
2598 }
2599
2600 break;
2601 }
2602 case SMART_ACTION_DO_ACTION:
2603 {
2604 int32 const actionId = e.action.doAction.isNegative ? -e.action.doAction.actionId : e.action.doAction.actionId;
2605 if (!e.action.doAction.instanceTarget)
2606 {
2607 if (targets.empty())
2608 break;
2609
2610 for (WorldObject* objTarget : targets)
2611 {
2612 if (Creature const* unitTarget = objTarget->ToCreature())
2613 {
2614 if (unitTarget->IsAIEnabled)
2615 {
2616 unitTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2617 }
2618 }
2619 else if (GameObject const* gobjTarget = objTarget->ToGameObject())
2620 {
2621 gobjTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2622 }
2623 }
2624
2625 }
2626 else
2627 {
2628 InstanceScript* instanceScript = nullptr;
2629 if (WorldObject* baseObj = GetBaseObject())
2630 {
2631 instanceScript = baseObj->GetInstanceScript();
2632 }
2633 // Action is triggered by AreaTrigger
2634 else if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
2635 {
2636 instanceScript = unit->GetInstanceScript();
2637 }
2638
2639 if (instanceScript)
2640 {
2641 instanceScript->DoAction(actionId);
2642 }
2643 }
2644 break;
2645 }
2646 case SMART_ACTION_DISABLE_EVADE:
2647 {
2648 if (!IsSmart())
2649 break;
2650
2651 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetEvadeDisabled(e.action.disableEvade.disable != 0);
2652 break;
2653 }
2654 case SMART_ACTION_SET_CORPSE_DELAY:
2655 {
2656 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2657 {
2658 if (IsCreature(target))
2659 target->ToCreature()->SetCorpseDelay(e.action.corpseDelay.timer);
2660 }
2661 break;
2662 }
2663 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_PCT:
2664 {
2665 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2666 if (Unit* targetUnit = target->ToUnit())
2667 targetUnit->SetHealth(targetUnit->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.setHealthPct.percent));
2668 break;
2669 }
2670 case SMART_ACTION_SET_MOVEMENT_SPEED:
2671 {
2672 uint32 speedInteger = e.action.movementSpeed.speedInteger;
2673 uint32 speedFraction = e.action.movementSpeed.speedFraction;
2674 float speed = float(speedInteger) + float(speedFraction) / std::pow(10, std::floor(std::log10(float(speedFraction ? speedFraction : 1)) + 1));
2675
2676 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2677 if (IsCreature(target))
2678 target->ToCreature()->SetSpeed(UnitMoveType(e.action.movementSpeed.movementType), speed);
2679
2680 break;
2681 }
2682 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_CINEMATIC:
2683 {
2684 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2685 {
2686 if (!IsPlayer(target))
2687 continue;
2688
2689 target->ToPlayer()->SendCinematicStart(e.action.cinematic.entry);
2690 }
2691 break;
2692 }
2693 default:
2694 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Unhandled Action type {}", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType());
2695 break;
2696 }
2697
2698 if (e.link && e.link != e.event_id)
2699 {
2700 SmartScriptHolder linked = FindLinkedEvent(e.link);
2701 if (linked.GetActionType() && linked.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
2702 ProcessEvent(linked, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
2703 else
2704 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Link Event {} not found or invalid, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.link);
2705 }
2706}
DEFAULT_LOCALE
#define DEFAULT_LOCALE
Definition: Common.h:88
int8
std::int8_t int8
Definition: Define.h:106

std::chrono::seconds Seconds

Definition: Random.cpp:57

Definition: Random.cpp:44

#define CAST_AI(a, b)
Definition: ScriptedCreature.h:27
SendGossipMenuFor

Definition: ScriptedGossip.cpp:45

Definition: SmartScriptMgr.h:645
SMART_ACTION_RISE_UP

Referenced by ProcessEvent(), and ProcessTimedAction().

◆ ProcessEvent()

void SmartScript::ProcessEvent ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
3375{
3376 if (!e.active && e.GetEventType() != SMART_EVENT_LINK)
3377 return;
3378
3379 if ((e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask)) || ((e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE) && e.runOnce))
3380 return;
3381
3382 if (!(e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_WHILE_CHARMED) && IsCharmedCreature(me))
3383 return;
3384
3385 switch (e.GetEventType())
3386 {
3387 case SMART_EVENT_LINK://special handling
3388 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3389 break;
3390 //called from Update tick
3391 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
3392 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3393 break;
3394 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
3395 if (me && me->IsEngaged())
3396 return;
3397 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3398 break;
3399 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
3400 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3401 return;
3402 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3403 break;
3404 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
3405 {
3406 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxHealth())
3407 return;
3408 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetHealthPct();
3409 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3410 return;
3411 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3412 break;
3413 }
3414 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
3415 {
3416 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxHealth())
3417 return;
3418 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetVictim()->GetHealthPct();
3419 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3420 return;
3421 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3422 break;
3423 }
3424 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
3425 {
3426 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
3427 return;
3428 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
3429 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3430 return;
3431 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3432 break;
3433 }
3434 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
3435 {
3436 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
3437 return;
3438 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetVictim()->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
3439 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3440 return;
3441 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3442 break;
3443 }
3444 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
3445 {
3446 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim())
3447 return;
3448
3449 if (me->IsInRange(me->GetVictim(), (float)e.event.rangeRepeat.minRange, (float)e.event.rangeRepeat.maxRange))
3450 {
3451 if (e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat == 2)
3452 {
3453 e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat = 1;
3454 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMax);
3455 }
3456 else
3457 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3458 }
3459 else
3460 RecalcTimer(e, 500, 500); // make it predictable
3461
3462 break;
3463 }
3464 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
3465 {
3466 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3467 return;
3468
3469 Unit* victim = me->GetVictim();
3470
3471 if (!victim || !victim->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
3472 return;
3473
3474 if (e.event.targetCasting.spellId > 0)
3475 if (Spell* currSpell = victim->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
3476 if (currSpell->m_spellInfo->Id != e.event.targetCasting.spellId)
3477 return;
3478
3479 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMin, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3480 break;
3481 }
3482 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
3483 {
3484 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3485 return;
3486
3487 Unit* target = DoSelectLowestHpFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealth.radius, e.event.friendlyHealth.hpDeficit);
3488 if (!target || !target->IsInCombat())
3489 {
3490 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
3491 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
3492 return;
3493 }
3494 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMax, target);
3495 break;
3496 }
3497 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
3498 {
3499 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3500 return;
3501
3502 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
3503 DoFindFriendlyCC(creatures, float(e.event.friendlyCC.radius));
3504 if (creatures.empty())
3505 {
3506 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
3507 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
3508 return;
3509 }
3510 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
3511 break;
3512 }
3513 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
3514 {
3515 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
3516 DoFindFriendlyMissingBuff(creatures, float(e.event.missingBuff.radius), e.event.missingBuff.spell);
3517
3518 if (creatures.empty())
3519 return;
3520
3521 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMin, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
3522 break;
3523 }
3524 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
3525 {
3526 if (!me)
3527 return;
3528 uint32 count = me->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
3529 if ((!e.event.aura.count && !count) || (e.event.aura.count && count >= e.event.aura.count))
3530 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax);
3531 break;
3532 }
3533 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
3534 {
3535 if (!me || !me->GetVictim())
3536 return;
3537 uint32 count = me->GetVictim()->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
3538 if (count < e.event.aura.count)
3539 return;
3540 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3541 break;
3542 }
3543 case SMART_EVENT_CHARMED:
3544 {
3545 if (bvar == (e.event.charm.onRemove != 1))
3546 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3547 break;
3548 }
3549 //no params
3550 case SMART_EVENT_AGGRO:
3551 case SMART_EVENT_DEATH:
3552 case SMART_EVENT_EVADE:
3553 case SMART_EVENT_REACHED_HOME:
3554 case SMART_EVENT_CHARMED_TARGET:
3555 case SMART_EVENT_CORPSE_REMOVED:
3556 case SMART_EVENT_AI_INIT:
3557 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_ADDPLAYER:
3558 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_REMOVE_PLAYER:
3559 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_ACCEPTED:
3560 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_OBJ_COMPLETION:
3561 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_COMPLETION:
3562 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_REWARDED:
3563 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_FAIL:
3564 case SMART_EVENT_JUST_SUMMONED:
3565 case SMART_EVENT_RESET:
3566 case SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED:
3567 case SMART_EVENT_FOLLOW_COMPLETED:
3568 case SMART_EVENT_ON_SPELLCLICK:
3569 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3570 break;
3571
3572 case SMART_EVENT_GOSSIP_HELLO:
3573 switch (e.event.gossipHello.filter)
3574 {
3575 case 0:
3576 // no filter set, always execute action
3577 break;
3578 case 1:
3579 // GossipHello only filter set, skip action if reportUse
3580 if (var0)
3581 {
3582 return;
3583 }
3584 break;
3585 case 2:
3586 // reportUse only filter set, skip action if GossipHello
3587 if (!var0)
3588 {
3589 return;
3590 }
3591 break;
3592 default:
3593 // Ignore any other value
3594 break;
3595 }
3596
3597 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3598 break;
3599 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
3600 {
3601 if (!me)
3602 return;
3603
3604 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
3605 {
3606 if (!victim->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), me))
3607 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.behindTarget.cooldownMin, e.event.behindTarget.cooldownMax, victim);
3608 }
3609 break;
3610 }
3611 case SMART_EVENT_RECEIVE_EMOTE:
3612 if (e.event.emote.emote == var0)
3613 {
3614 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3615 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.emote.cooldownMin, e.event.emote.cooldownMax);
3616 }
3617 break;
3618 case SMART_EVENT_KILL:
3619 {
3620 if (!me || !unit)
3621 return;
3622 if (e.event.kill.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3623 return;
3624 if (e.event.kill.creature && unit->GetEntry() != e.event.kill.creature)
3625 return;
3626 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.kill.cooldownMin, e.event.kill.cooldownMax);
3627 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3628 break;
3629 }
3630 case SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT_TARGET:
3631 case SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT:
3632 {
3633 if (!spell)
3634 return;
3635 if ((!e.event.spellHit.spell || spell->Id == e.event.spellHit.spell) &&
3636 (!e.event.spellHit.school || (spell->SchoolMask & e.event.spellHit.school)))
3637 {
3638 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.spellHit.cooldownMin, e.event.spellHit.cooldownMax);
3639 ProcessAction(e, unit, 0, 0, bvar, spell);
3640 }
3641 break;
3642 }
3643 case SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS:
3644 {
3645 if (!me || me->IsEngaged())
3646 return;
3647 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
3648 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
3649
3650 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
3651 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
3652 {
3653 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
3654 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
3655 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
3656 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
3657 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
3658 {
3659 if (e.event.los.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3660 return;
3661 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
3662 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3663 }
3664 }
3665 break;
3666 }
3667 case SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS:
3668 {
3669 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3670 return;
3671 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
3672 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
3673
3674 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
3675 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
3676 {
3677 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
3678 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
3679 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
3680 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
3681 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
3682 {
3683 if (e.event.los.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3684 return;
3685 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
3686 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3687 }
3688 }
3689 break;
3690 }
3691 case SMART_EVENT_RESPAWN:
3692 {
3693 if (!GetBaseObject())
3694 return;
3695 if (e.event.respawn.type == SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_MAP && GetBaseObject()->GetMapId() != e.event.respawn.map)
3696 return;
3697 if (e.event.respawn.type == SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_AREA && GetBaseObject()->GetZoneId() != e.event.respawn.area)
3698 return;
3699 ProcessAction(e);
3700 break;
3701 }
3702 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMONED_UNIT:
3703 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMONED_UNIT_DIES:
3704 {
3705 if (!IsCreature(unit))
3706 return;
3707 if (e.event.summoned.creature && unit->GetEntry() != e.event.summoned.creature)
3708 return;
3709 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.summoned.cooldownMin, e.event.summoned.cooldownMax);
3710 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3711 break;
3712 }
3713 case SMART_EVENT_RECEIVE_HEAL:
3714 case SMART_EVENT_DAMAGED:
3715 case SMART_EVENT_DAMAGED_TARGET:
3716 {
3717 if (var0 > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || var0 < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3718 return;
3719 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3720 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3721 break;
3722 }
3723 case SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM:
3724 {
3725 if ((e.event.movementInform.type && var0 != e.event.movementInform.type) || (e.event.movementInform.id && var1 != e.event.movementInform.id))
3726 return;
3727 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3728 break;
3729 }
3730 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_RELOCATE:
3731 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_START:
3732 {
3733 if (e.event.waypoint.pathID && var0 != e.event.waypoint.pathID)
3734 return;
3735 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3736 break;
3737 }
3738 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_REACHED:
3739 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_RESUMED:
3740 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_PAUSED:
3741 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_STOPPED:
3742 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_ENDED:
3743 {
3744 if (!me || (e.event.waypoint.pointID && var0 != e.event.waypoint.pointID) || (e.event.waypoint.pathID && GetPathId() != e.event.waypoint.pathID))
3745 return;
3746 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3747 break;
3748 }
3749 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMON_DESPAWNED:
3750 {
3751 if (e.event.summoned.creature && e.event.summoned.creature != var0)
3752 return;
3753 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.summoned.cooldownMin, e.event.summoned.cooldownMax);
3754 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3755 break;
3756 }
3757 case SMART_EVENT_INSTANCE_PLAYER_ENTER:
3758 {
3759 if (e.event.instancePlayerEnter.team && var0 != e.event.instancePlayerEnter.team)
3760 return;
3761 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.instancePlayerEnter.cooldownMin, e.event.instancePlayerEnter.cooldownMax);
3762 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3763 break;
3764 }
3765 case SMART_EVENT_ACCEPTED_QUEST:
3766 case SMART_EVENT_REWARD_QUEST:
3767 {
3768 if (e.event.quest.quest && var0 != e.event.quest.quest)
3769 return;
3770 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.quest.cooldownMin, e.event.quest.cooldownMax);
3771 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3772 break;
3773 }
3774 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_ADDCREATURE:
3775 {
3776 if (e.event.transportAddCreature.creature && var0 != e.event.transportAddCreature.creature)
3777 return;
3778 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3779 break;
3780 }
3781 case SMART_EVENT_AREATRIGGER_ONTRIGGER:
3782 {
3783 if (e.event.areatrigger.id && var0 != e.event.areatrigger.id)
3784 return;
3785 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3786 break;
3787 }
3788 case SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER:
3789 {
3790 if (var0 != e.event.textOver.textGroupID || (e.event.textOver.creatureEntry && e.event.textOver.creatureEntry != var1))
3791 return;
3792 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3793 break;
3794 }
3795 case SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET:
3796 {
3797 if (e.event.dataSet.id != var0 || e.event.dataSet.value != var1)
3798 return;
3799 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.dataSet.cooldownMin, e.event.dataSet.cooldownMax);
3800 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3801 break;
3802 }
3803 case SMART_EVENT_PASSENGER_REMOVED:
3804 case SMART_EVENT_PASSENGER_BOARDED:
3805 {
3806 if (!unit)
3807 return;
3808 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMax.repeatMin, e.event.minMax.repeatMax);
3809 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3810 break;
3811 }
3812 case SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED:
3813 {
3814 if (e.event.timedEvent.id == var0)
3815 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3816 break;
3817 }
3818 case SMART_EVENT_GOSSIP_SELECT:
3819 {
3820 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Gossip Select: menu {} action {}", var0, var1); //little help for scripters
3821 if (e.event.gossip.sender != var0 || e.event.gossip.action != var1)
3822 return;
3823 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3824 break;
3825 }
3826 case SMART_EVENT_EVENT_PHASE_CHANGE:
3827 {
3828 if (!IsInPhase(e.event.eventPhaseChange.phasemask))
3829 {
3830 return;
3831 }
3832
3833 ProcessAction(e, GetLastInvoker());
3834 break;
3835 }
3836 case SMART_EVENT_GAME_EVENT_START:
3837 case SMART_EVENT_GAME_EVENT_END:
3838 {
3839 if (e.event.gameEvent.gameEventId != var0)
3840 return;
3841 ProcessAction(e, nullptr, var0);
3842 break;
3843 }
3844 case SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED:
3845 {
3846 if (e.event.goStateChanged.state != var0)
3847 return;
3848 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3849 break;
3850 }
3851 case SMART_EVENT_GO_EVENT_INFORM:
3852 {
3853 if (e.event.eventInform.eventId != var0)
3854 return;
3855 ProcessAction(e, nullptr, var0);
3856 break;
3857 }
3858 case SMART_EVENT_ACTION_DONE:
3859 {
3860 if (e.event.doAction.eventId != var0)
3861 return;
3862 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3863 break;
3864 }
3865 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
3866 {
3867 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3868 return;
3869
3870 ObjectVector targets;
3871 switch (e.GetTargetType())
3872 {
3873 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
3874 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
3875 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
3876 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3877 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3878 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3879 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3880 {
3881 if (targets.empty())
3882 return;
3883 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3884 {
3885 if (IsUnit(target) && me->IsFriendlyTo(target->ToUnit()) && target->ToUnit()->IsAlive() && target->ToUnit()->IsInCombat())
3886 {
3887 uint32 healthPct = uint32(target->ToUnit()->GetHealthPct());
3888 if (healthPct > e.event.friendlyHealthPct.maxHpPct || healthPct < e.event.friendlyHealthPct.minHpPct)
3889 {
3890 continue;
3891 }
3892
3893 target = target->ToUnit();
3894 break;
3895 }
3896 }
3897
3898 break;
3899 }
3900 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
3901 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
3902 DoSelectLowestHpPercentFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealthPct.radius, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.minHpPct, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.maxHpPct);
3903 break;
3904 default:
3905 return;
3906 }
3907
3908 if (targets.empty())
3909 return;
3910
3911 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMax);
3912 break;
3913 }
3914 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
3915 {
3916 if (!me)
3917 return;
3918
3919 WorldObject* creature = nullptr;
3920
3921 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
3922 {
3923 creature = FindCreatureNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
3924
3925 if (!creature)
3926 return;
3927
3928 if (!me->IsInRange(creature, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
3929 return;
3930 }
3931 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
3932 {
3933 std::list<Creature*> list;
3934 me->GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
3935
3936 if (!list.empty())
3937 creature = list.front();
3938 }
3939
3940 if (creature)
3941 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
3942
3943 break;
3944 }
3945 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
3946 {
3947 if (!me)
3948 return;
3949
3950 WorldObject* gameobject = nullptr;
3951
3952 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
3953 {
3954 gameobject = FindGameObjectNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
3955
3956 if (!gameobject)
3957 return;
3958
3959 if (!me->IsInRange(gameobject, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
3960 return;
3961 }
3962 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
3963 {
3964 std::list<GameObject*> list;
3965 me->GetGameObjectListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
3966
3967 if (!list.empty())
3968 gameobject = list.front();
3969 }
3970
3971 if (gameobject)
3972 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
3973
3974 break;
3975 }
3976 case SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET:
3977 if (e.event.counter.id != var0 || GetCounterValue(e.event.counter.id) != e.event.counter.value)
3978 return;
3979
3980 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.counter.cooldownMin, e.event.counter.cooldownMax);
3981 break;
3982 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
3983 {
3984 ObjectVector units;
3985 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayer.radius));
3986
3987 if (!units.empty())
3988 {
3989 if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3990 return;
3991
3992 if (units.size() >= e.event.nearPlayer.minCount)
3993 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3994 }
3995 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer);
3996 break;
3997 }
3998 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
3999 {
4000 ObjectVector units;
4001 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayerNegation.radius));
4002
4003 if (!units.empty())
4004 {
4005 if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4006 return;
4007
4008 if (units.size() < e.event.nearPlayerNegation.minCount)
4009 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4010 }
4011 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer);
4012 break;
4013 }
4014 default:
4015 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessEvent: Unhandled Event type {}", e.GetEventType());
4016 break;
4017 }
4018}

◆ ProcessEventsFor()

void SmartScript::ProcessEventsFor ( SMART_EVENT  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
96{
97 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
98 {
99 SMART_EVENT eventType = SMART_EVENT((*i).GetEventType());
100 if (eventType == SMART_EVENT_LINK)//special handling
101 continue;
102
103 if (eventType == e)
104 {
105 ConditionList conds = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForSmartEvent((*i).entryOrGuid, (*i).event_id, (*i).source_type);
106 ConditionSourceInfo info = ConditionSourceInfo(unit, GetBaseObject(), me ? me->GetVictim() : nullptr);
107
108 if (sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(info, conds))
109 ProcessEvent(*i, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
110 }
111 }
112}
sConditionMgr

◆ ProcessTimedAction()

void SmartScript::ProcessTimedAction ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
uint32 const &  min,
uint32 const &  max,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,

)
2709{
2710 // xinef: extended by selfs victim
2711 ConditionList const conds = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForSmartEvent(e.entryOrGuid, e.event_id, e.source_type);
2712 ConditionSourceInfo info = ConditionSourceInfo(unit, GetBaseObject(), me ? me->GetVictim() : nullptr);
2713
2714 if (sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(info, conds))
2715 {
2716 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
2717 RecalcTimer(e, min, max);
2718 }
2719 else
2720 RecalcTimer(e, 5000, 5000);
2721}

◆ ResetBaseObject()

void SmartScript::ResetBaseObject ( )
inline
182 {
183 WorldObject* lookupRoot = me;
184 if (!lookupRoot)
185 lookupRoot = go;
186
187 if (lookupRoot)
188 {
189 if (meOrigGUID)
190 {
191 if (Creature* m = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*lookupRoot, meOrigGUID))
192 {
193 me = m;
194 go = nullptr;
195 }
196 }
197
198 if (goOrigGUID)
199 {
200 if (GameObject* o = ObjectAccessor::GetGameObject(*lookupRoot, goOrigGUID))
201 {
202 me = nullptr;
203 go = o;
204 }
205 }
206 }
207
208 goOrigGUID.Clear();
209 meOrigGUID.Clear();
210 }

◆ SetScript9()

void SmartScript::SetScript9 ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
uint32  entry 
)
4466{
4467 //do NOT clear mTimedActionList if it's being iterated because it will invalidate the iterator and delete
4468 // any SmartScriptHolder contained like the "e" parameter passed to this function
4469 if (isProcessingTimedActionList)
4470 {
4471 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is trying to overwrite timed action list from a timed action, this is not allowed!.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
4472 return;
4473 }
4474
4475 // Do NOT allow to start a new actionlist if a previous one is already running, unless explicitly allowed. We need to always finish the current actionlist
4476 if (!e.action.timedActionList.allowOverride && !mTimedActionList.empty())
4477 {
4478 return;
4479 }
4480
4481 mTimedActionList.clear();
4482 mTimedActionList = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(entry, SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST);
4483 if (mTimedActionList.empty())
4484 return;
4485 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4486 {
4487 i->enableTimed = i == mTimedActionList.begin();//enable processing only for the first action
4488
4489 if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 0)
4490 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC;
4491 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 1)
4492 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC;
4493 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType > 1)
4494 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
4495
4496 InitTimer((*i));
4497 }
4498}

◆ StoreCounter()

void SmartScript::StoreCounter ( uint32  id,
uint32  value,
uint32  reset,
uint32  subtract 
)
inline
124 {
125 CounterMap::iterator itr = mCounterList.find(id);
126 if (itr != mCounterList.end())
127 {
128 if (!reset && !subtract)
129 {
130 itr->second += value;
131 }
132 else if (subtract)
133 {
134 itr->second -= value;
135 }
136 else
137 {
138 itr->second = value;
139 }
140 }
141 else
142 {
143 mCounterList.insert(std::make_pair(id, value));
144 }
145
146 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET, nullptr, id);
147 }

◆ UpdateTimer()

void SmartScript::UpdateTimer ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
uint32 const  diff 
)
4063{
4064 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
4065 return;
4066
4067 if (e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask))
4068 return;
4069
4070 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC && (!me || !me->IsEngaged()))
4071 return;
4072
4073 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC && (me && me->IsEngaged()))//can be used with me=nullptr (go script)
4074 return;
4075
4076 if (e.timer < diff)
4077 {
4078 // delay spell cast event if another spell is being casted
4079 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_CAST)
4080 {
4081 if (!(e.action.cast.flags & (SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS | SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED)))
4082 {
4083 if (me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4084 {
4085 e.timer = 1;
4086 return;
4087 }
4088 }
4089 }
4090
4091 // Delay flee for assist event if casting
4092 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST && me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4093 {
4094 e.timer = 1;
4095 return;
4096 }
4097
4098 e.active = true;//activate events with cooldown
4099 switch (e.GetEventType())//process ONLY timed events
4100 {
4101 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4102 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4103 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4104 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4105 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4106 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
4107 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
4108 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
4109 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
4110 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4111 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
4112 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
4113 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
4114 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
4115 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
4116 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
4117 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
4118 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
4119 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4120 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4121 {
4122 ProcessEvent(e);
4123 if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST)
4124 {
4125 e.enableTimed = false;//disable event if it is in an ActionList and was processed once
4126 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4127 {
4128 //find the first event which is not the current one and enable it
4129 if (i->event_id > e.event_id)
4130 {
4131 i->enableTimed = true;
4132 break;
4133 }
4134 }
4135 }
4136 break;
4137 }
4138 }
4139 }
4140 else
4141 e.timer -= diff;
4142}
